title: Imisebenti Yesikhungo Sekunika Lusito Ngeticelo Letifakiwe Yanga-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Sikhungo Sekunika Lusito Ngeticelo Letifakiwe (i-CACH) luhlelo lwesikhashana lolacalwa Litiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha kusita titjudeni letifuna kungena Eluhlelweni Lwetikolo Temfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha ngemuva kwamatekuletjeni (i-PSET) kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi tingahle tibukane nesimo lapho khona:

Bafake sicelo ngesikhatsi esikhungweni labasitsandzako kodvwa sicelo sabo sangamukeleki kantsi nyalo sikhatsi sesihambile kutsi bangafaka lesinye sicelo kulenye indzawo.
Bafundzi labangemukelwa bangakafaki sicelo ngoba bangenako loko lokudzingekako kute bafake sicelo sekufundza ngenca yemiphumela yabo lengemihle yeLibanga le-11 kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi imiphumela yabo yeLibanga le-12 iyabavumela kwekutsi bangangena.
Abakafaki sicelo kusenesikhatsi ngenca yesizatfu lesitsite noma lesinye noma abakafaki sicelo nje sanhlobo.
Abati kwekutsi bafuna kufundzela ini nabacedza matekuletjeni.
Bayati kutsi bafuna kufundzela ini kodvwa abanasiciniseko sekutsi loku labakhetse kukufundzela kungumsebenti lolungile yini.

Tinsita letiniketwa yi-CACH
Ticelo tematfuba ekufundza leticondziswe ku-PSET (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi eTheknoloji, ematheknikhali nemakolishi ekufundzela umsebenti neMkhakha Wetemfundvo neMitimba Yekucecesha.
Lwatiso netinsita ngetimali (lwatiso nge- NSFAS).
Tinsita tekutfutfukiswa kwetemisebenti (kwelulekwa, lwatiso, kwecwayiswa nekuhlelela umsebenti/lwatiso ngekusekelwa ngetimali kanye netindlela tekusitwa ngetimali).
Kusekelwa kwemaciko lasebenta ngetandla (Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekusekelwa Kwentfutfuko Yemaciko Lasebenta Ngetandla).
Loluhlelo lwe-CACH lucala ngamhla ti-3 Bhimbidvwane 2018, masinyane ngembi kwekukhishwa kwemiphumela yeluhlolo lwe-NSC, kantsi lutawusebenta kudzimate kuphele inyanga yeNdlovana nga-2018.

Isebenta njani i-CACH?
Sigaba seku-1: Titjudeni letingakatsatfwa ndzawo kulesinye setikhungo labafake sicelo kuto, noma letifuna ematfuba ekufundza e-PSET, tingatsintsana ne-CACH ngekusebentisa iNombolo yaMahhala: 0800 356 635, iwebhusayithi:
www.dhet.gov.za noma ngekutfumela ligama lakho neNombolo Yematisi nge-SMS ku: 49200 noma bangabhalisa ku-inthanethi.
Ungabuye utfole kabanti ngekuvakashela likhasi labo le-Facebook lelitsi: CACH_SA.

Sigaba sesi-2: Ema-Ejenti atawushayela lomfundzi lofake sicelo mahhala, batamshayela kulesikhungo sekutsintsana bese babhalisa yonkhe imininingwane ledzingekako eluhlweni lwedatha ye-CACH, kufaka ekhatsi loku umfundzi langatsandza kukufundzela kanye nesifundza langatsandza kufundzela kuso.

Sigaba sesi-3: Imininingwane yonkhe yalona lofake sicelo kanye nemiphumela yamatekuletjeni itawucinisekiswa ibuye idluliselwe kuleso sikhungo semfundvo lephakeme kwentelwe kutfolelwa
sikhala nekungeniswa kuleso sikolo uma kuphumeleleka.

Sigaba sesi-4: Luhlelo lwe-CACH lutawucinisekisa lolwatiso lwemfundzi bese balutfumela etikhungweni letisolo tinetikhala letivulekile. Lapho kusolo kunetikhala khona kantsi bafundzi banako loku lokudzingekako, tikhungo titawushayela labo labafake ticelo ngco.

Lekufanele ukwati
I-CACH angeke yacinisekisa noma bani lofake sicelo kutsi utasitfola sikhala sekufundza.
I-CACH angeke yati kwekutsi lesikhungo sitamphendvula nini lona lofake sicelo kute bamtfolele indzawo.

I-CACH ibasita njani labafake ticelo labangenasiciniseko sekutsi bafundzele ini noma labo labangenako loko lokudzingekako kutsi bangene eLuhlelweni lwe- PSET?
Luhlelo lwe-CACH lusebentisana neTinsita Tekutfutfukisa Emakhono Velonkhe (i-CDS) lesita ekuniketeni lwatiso lolufaka ekhatsi yonkhe intfo ngetemisebenti nekululekwa nge:

Imisebenti nalongakufundzelwa.
Kukhetsa tifundvo.
Lwatiso ngekubhala luhlolo lwekuchibiyela.
kubhalela kutfola imiphumela lencono yamatekuletjeni.
Ematfuba ekufundza laniketwa beluhlelo lwe-PSET.
Tindlela tekuniketwa kwetimali nelusito ngetimali tekufundza.
Lwatiso lolumayelana netinchubo tekufaka ticelo netinsuku tekuvalwa.
Ticelo letifakwa ngesigamu sesibili netinsuku tekubhalisa.
Noma ngabe ngubani longatsandza kusebentisa letinsita letiniketwa yi- CDS angashayela indzawo leniketa lusito yaka-CDS ngekusebentisa letindlela letilandzelako:

title: Kusutsa kuhambisana nekutfola imiphumela lemihle
author: More Matshediso
text:
laseNingizimu Afrika laba- setikolweni tahulumende sebayakhona kwenta umse- benti wabo kancono, sibo- nga loluhlelo lwahulumende lolucinisekisa kwekutsi tisu tabo tihlale tisemfi ngekudla lokunemsoco.
Litiko Letemfundvo Lesise-
kelo (i-DBE), ngekusebentisa Luhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwe- tikolo Lwekondla (i-NSNP), liyengcile injongo yalo yekunika kudla bantfwana bakuleli labalinganiselwa kumaphesenti lange-75.

Umcondzisi we-NSNP kule- litiko, Neo Rakwena, utsite tikolo leti-20 619 tiphekela tibuye tinike kudla etiko-lweni onkhe malanga ba- ntfwana labalinganiselwa eti-9 032 622 velonkhe.
Utsite tikolo letingasiyo ince- nye yaloluhlelo kufanele kutsi tivakashele emahhovisi asesigodzini sabo uma ngabe tifuna kuba yincenye yalo. N gemnyakatimali	wa- nga-2015/16, tigidzi letili- nganiselwa ku-R5 703 tafa- kwa kuloluhlelo.
Rakwena  utsite  lemali 
lecitfwe kuloluhlelo iyachi- tjiyelwa njalo ngemnyaka kute ihambisane nekunyuka kwetintfo, kantsi ibhajethi yanga-2017/18 ilinganiselwa kutigidzi leti-R6.4.
Loluhlelo lucedza kulamba kwesikhashana kantsi futsi lufaka sandla kunhlalakahle yebantfwana.
“Bantfwana labanyenti ba- vela emakhaya lahluphekile langakhoni kuba nekudla labangakudla, kantsi ku-
labanye bafundzi, lokudla
labakudla esikolweni ngiko kudla labakudlela lilanga lonkhe. Kudla labakudla esi- kolweni kuyabasita kutsi bakhone kufundza, kulale- lisisa nekutimbandzakanya eklasini,” washo njalo.
Emanani ebafundzi lababha- lisako etikolweni nalabange- na sikolo anyukile ngenca yaloluhlelo lwekutfola kudla esikolweni.
Kungasikudzala, iKhabhi- nethi ivume kushicilelwa kwe Mbiko Wekulingani- swakwe-NSNP lobhalwe Litiko Letekuhlela, Kuca- phela kanye Nekulungisa (i-DPME). Uchaza imphume- lelo netinyatselo letingatsa- tfwa kuphumelelisa lemita- mo.
Umcondzisi Wekulinganisa
ka-DPME, Jabu Mathe, utsite injongo lenkhulu yekuli- nganisa kwekutsi kuhlolwe kutsi ngabe i-NSNP yenti- wa ngalendlela letawuba nemiphumela lekhombisa umehluko lomkhulu kutem- philo kantsi kube nenzuzo emfundvweni yebafundzi. Uphindze wagcizelela kwe- kutsi injongo yaloluhlelo seyiphelele kwekutsi kwenti- we kancono temphilo nesimo sekudla kahle kwebafundzi labaphuye kakhulu eNingi- zimu Afrika. Loluhlelo lu- hlose kufinyelela kubo bonkhe  bantfwana  laba-
setikolweni tahulumende
letisemkhakheni welizi- nga lebuphuya 1 kuya ku-3, letilinganiselwa kumaphe- senti la-60 etikolweni leti- phuye kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.
Loluhlelo luphindze futsi lusite ngekwehlisa buphuya emimangweni ngekwakha ematfuba emsebenti.
“ Lokulinganisa kutfole kwekutsi i-NSNP inika ematfuba kulabatinikele kusebenta ngalokudla la- bangetulu kweti-50 000 njalo ngemnyaka lekufanele kutsi baphekele bantfwana, kantsi batfola imali yekubabonga lenge-R960 njalo ngenya- nga,” kusho Mathe.
“Loku kusho kutsi tigidzi
letinge-R576 ngemnyaka ti- yiswa kumholo wekubabo- nga kute kuzuze emalunga emmango.”
Loluhlelo lukhutsata ku- tsi kubekhona lokwentiwa kutemnotfo njengoba boso- mabhizinisi labasebancane, labasemkhatsini nalese- bakhulile kanye netinhjlanga- no letisebenta ngekuhlanga- nyela tiyazuza njengebantfu labatfula tinsita kuleto ti- fundza ngekutsi umsebe- nti uniketwe ngekulingana (KaZulu-Natal, eGauteng, eMpumalanga naseNyaka- tfo Kapa).
Kutsenga  tibhidvo  ku-
leyo ndzawo kunemtselela
wekuniketa inzuzo etiko-
lweni nas em m angweni kubuye kukhulise tekulima etigodzini tasemakhaya.
Lombiko ubuye futsi wave- ta kwekutsi tifundza, i- Nshonalanga Koloni, iMpu- malanga, iMphumalanga Koloni, iNyakatfo Koloni neNyakatfo Nshonalanga ti- lwente kahle kakhulu lolu- hlelo kuleminyaka lendluli- le.

title: Babuyiselwa sitfunti labo labasindze ekuhlaselweni ngetemacansi
author: luthando Motswai
text:
Lesikhungo sivulelwe ku sita bantfu labatisulu teku hlukunyetwa ngetemacansi nekubanika lusito lolulungilo lwetekunakekelwa, kwelule kwa, nekufinyelela kubaseshi nebashushisi labasebenta ngekutikhandla ndzawonye.  Sikhulumi seLitiko Lese mang Matuka utsite labatisulu ekucaleni bebahamba maba nga lamadze kute bafinyelele kuletinsita. Lesikhungo lesisandza kuvulwa sitawusita bantfu baseKatlehong, eThokoza, eVosloorus naseti ndzaweni letisedvute.
“NjengeLitiko, sifuna kutsi kubekhona tinsita letincono temphilo kumntfu wonkhe ngekucecesha nekufundzisa tisebenti temphilo ngema khono lakhetsekile ekuncedza tisulu teludlame. Kuleminyaka lemitsatfu leyendlule, tise benti tekwelapha letinge-106 tiphumelele etifundvweni te-Sexual Assault Care Practitioner Course.”Utsite litiko litawuchubeka lisebentisane netinhlanga no letingekho ngaphansi kwahulumende (ema-NGO) nalabanye labancedzisa ngekwesekela ngetengco ndvo ngekugcizelela ku gwema kakhulu umonakalo lowenteka ngemva kwekuhlukumeteka.
EmaThuthuzela Care Centre asungulelwe kwenta ncono  indlela emacala ekudlwengu lwa nalamanye ekuhlukunye twa ngetemacansi atsatfwa ngayo. Labatisulu nyalo bance dvwa ngendlela lenesitfunti nasendzaweni lenakekelako.
Letikhungo tingephansi kweMkhandlu Wetebushu shisi Wavelonkhe (i-NPA), kanye neLitiko Letemphilo, Litiko Letekutfutfukiswa Kwetenhlalakahle neLitiko Letebulungiswa Nekutfu tfukiswa Kwemtsetfosisekelo, kanye neMbutfo Wetemaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS).
Kunetikhungo letisikhombi sa eGauteng. Sikhungo se kucala savulwa esibhedlela iChris Hani Baragwanath Hospital ngemnyaka wa-2000.
Dk Efadzwa Tipoy, umphatsi lomkhulu wekwelapha lo phetse iSinakekelwe  Thuthuzela Care Centre, weluleke bantfu kutsi umangabe bahle babetisulu tekuhlukunyetwa ngetemacasi, kufanele kutsi bayewubika kulesikhu-ngo ngekuphutfuma.
“Letikhungo tinika bantfu umutsi wekuvikela kutfola sifo semacansi kufaka ekhatsi kuvuvukala kwesibi ndzi neligciwane lesandvulelangculazi (i-HIV).  Lona lohlukumetekile utawukiketwa emaphilisi ekuvikela kukhulelwa. Ungagezi. Wota naleti mphahla lobe utigcokile kulesikhungo utifake ephepheni hhayi eplastikini,” kusho Dk Tipoy.
Wengete ngekutsi kusukela kwavulwa lesikhungo, linyukile lizinga lebantfu labasebentisa letinsita lete tfulwako kantsi futsi se kunesitfunti ngobe nyalo bantfu sebayakhona kugeza umabacedza kuhlolwa.
Ingcinamba leyodvwa lo mtfolamphilo lesolo  ubukene nayo kutsi ba ntfu bafika sebendlulelwe sikhatsi – kubalulekile kutsi bufakazi bugcogcwe nesisu lu sinikwe umutsi ngembi kwekutsi kuphele ema-awa lange-72 sihlaselwe.

title: Tinswane letisandza kubelekwa tihlaselwa yiListeriosis  kalula
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Litiko leTemphilo likubuke ngeliso lelibucayi kuvela kwe-Listeriosis. Bali-119 bantfu lasebabikwe ngekutsi bahlaselwa ngule sifo kusukela ngamhla ti-5 Ingongoni. Uma babonkhe bangema-727 bantfu labacinisekisiwe kutsi bahlaselwe ngulesifo ngemnyaka wa-2017.
Sikhungo Sekuvikela Nekulwa Netifo sichaza i-Listeriosis  njengesifo lesiyingoti kodvwa lesi laphelako futsi lesivikele-kako esibangwa ligciwane i-Listeria monocytogenes.  Sitfolakala emhlabatsini, emantini nasetibhidvweni. Tintfo letentiwa ngetilwa nyana  – njengenyama nelubisi , kudla lokutfolakala elwandle kanye nekudla lokufana netitselo netibhi dvo letingenaso lesifo.
Nanome i-Listeriosis ihlasela wonkhe umu ntfu, bantfu labasengotini lenkhulu yekuhlaselwa ngulesifo ngemaswane la-sandza kubelekwa, bantfu labagugile, bantfu labasika-ti labakhulelwe nebantfu labanemasotja emtimba laphansi njengebantu la-bane-HIV , sifo sashukela, mdlavuta, sifo sesibindzi nobe sifo setinso lesinga lapheki.
Bantfu labahlaseleka lula ngalesifo ngemaswane – lanemalanga lange-28 ate lwe, nebantfu labane minyaka lenge-15 kuya ku-49. Labantfu banaleminyaka benta 70% webantfu labahlaselwa ngulesifo.
Litiko ligcugcutele bomake labakhulelwe kutsi babhalise kuMomConnect kute batewukwatiswa kabanti ngeListeriosis njengobe bantfwana la banemalanga langephansi kwalange-28 bahlaseleka kakhulu.
“Uma sibuka lubalobalo lwebantfu labatsintseka ko, sicaphele kutsi kubo bonkhe labantfu bahlaseleka lula, ngemaswane lahlaseleka kakhulu. Uma sibukisisa ngekwemnyaka sukela ekubelekweni kuya kilabo babeminyaka lenge-93 budzala, ema swane wodvwa enta 40% webantfu labahlaseleka lula,” kusho Indvuna Yetemphilo Dk Aaron Motsoaledi.  Indvuna icele tisebenti tetemphilo kutsi tica phele kakhulu maticilonga bomake labakhulelwe.
“Kukhishwe sicelo lesikhetsekile kutisebe nti tetemphilo nebantfu bonkhe kutsi banakekele bonkhe labasikati la bakhulelwe ngalokukhe tsekile. Umangabe use benta ngemntfu lokhule-lwe nobe luswane hlolisisa kutsi ngabe lowo muntfu akanaso lesifo,” ushilo.

title: Sita kuvikela kuphela kwemanti
author: More Matshediso
text:
Loku kuphocelele labaphetse kutsi babeke imitsetfo lecinile kute kutsi emanti angapheli nge-kushesha, lapho kutawuba bete emanti etimpompini.  Lidolobha laseKapa litawungenisa imikhawulo yelizinga 6B. Loku kusho kutsi kutawuba nemkhawulo welusuku longemalitha la-50 emanti noma nga phansi umuntfu ngamunye, noma ngabe kusekhaya, emsebentini, esikolweni noma kuphi kulenye indzawo.  Ngalesikhatsi lelidolobha licondzise yonkhe imitamo yalo yekuvikela kuphela kwemanti, litsi lidzinga kutilungiselela simo lapho khona lingakhona kulawula lokwetfulwa kwemanti kulelidolobha kudzimate kufike busika. “Sitawuvala kutfunyelwa kwemanti etimpompini uma ngabe emadamu etfu afinyelela ezingeni lelingemaphesenti langu-13.5. Uma ngabe emazinga emadamu sekakumaphesenti langu-13.5, sitawucala kuvala loluhlelo lwekutfumela ema-nti etimpompini, ngaphandle kwetindzawo letibalulekile te-mabhizinisi netikhungo, letinjengetibhedlela,” kusho lelidolobha ngesitatimende.  Uma loku kwenteka, emanti bantfu batawalandza etindzaweni letibekiwe kulo lonkhe lelidolobha. Umuntfu ngamunye utawunikwa emalitha lange-25 ngelilanga.  Lelidolobha livule Tikhungo talo Letisebenta Ngetinhlekelele (i-DOC) kutsi ticale luhlelo lwe-Water Disaster Plan, lelitawucala kusebenta uma ngabe kwenteka kutsi kuphele emanti.
EmabhulomashiniLelidolobha alikukhutsati nakancane lokusetjentiswa kwemabulomashini lagujwa ngaphandle kantsi litsi kutselela kutawufinyetwa kube sikhatsi lesingandluli lihora linye kuphela ngaboLesibili nangeMgcibelo, ngembi kwe-nsimbi ye-9 ekuseni nangemuva kwensimbi ye-6 ntsambama.
“Ibhulomashini/indzawo lengumtfombo wemanti kufanele ikalwe kantsi bonkhe labayisebentisako kufanele bagcine emarekhodi futsi agcinwe kwentelwa kuhlolwa,” kusho lelidolobha.
Lichubeke latsi bantfu labahlala khona kufanele batfole imvume ka-DWS uma ngabe bafuna kutsenga noma kutsengisa emanti emabhuloma-shini/indzawo lengumtfombo wemanti.  Njengencenye yemitamo yahulumende yekulawula kusetjentiswa kwemanti, i-DWS itse labaphetse basebentisa tindlela leticinile kute bacinisekise kwekutsi lemitsetfo lecinile le-bekiwe yekwabelwa kwemanti iyalandzelelwa.  Lelidolobha lisebenta nelicembu lebemtsetfo neLitsimba Lebaphenyi Lelikhetsekile kucinisekisa kuhambisana nemtsetfo.  Kutsatsa tinyatselo ngekumelana nalabaphula umtsetfo  Lelitiko lisandza kwenta umtamo ngekubambisana nalelidolobha, libukete ekuse-tjentisweni kwemanti ngendlela lengafanele endzaweni yase-Mfuleni.  Lenchubo ihlose kucondzisa konkhe kungasebentiseki kahle kwemanti nekungahambisani nalomtsetfo wekusebentisa emanti ngendlela lebekiwe, bebabukete ikakhulukati kuletindzawo letiwasha timoto letingekho emtsetfweni.  “Ngekwemikhawulo yalelidolobha yemazinga 6B, la manti ladlekako (lanatsekako) amasipala angeke asetjentise-lwa kuwasha timoto. Tindzawo tekuwasha timoto letingekho emtsetfweni tidla emanti lamanyenti. Banini betindzawo tekuwasha timoto letinyenti basebentisa emaphayiphi latimele kuhambisa ibhizinisi yabo, kantsi labanye basebentisa emanti lavela etimpompini,” kusho lelitiko.
Noma bakhona labangemancusa emanti labatinikele labasebentela kusita kuvikela kuphela kwemanti, lelidolobha licela bantfu balo kutsi nabo badlale indzima yabo ekongeni emanti. “Sicela bonkhe labasebentisa emanti kutsi bangenelele kulomtamo weLidolobha LaseKa pa,” kusho Lisekela Sodolobha waseKapa Ian Neilson.

title: Tfola emandla akho futsi, bika kudlwengulwa
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Kungako Emaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) abe netinhlelo lebatilungisako kwenta kube lula futsi kuphe-phe kutsi bantfu bakhone kubika lobugebengu.
Sikhulumeli semaphoyisa ase Mpumalanga Colonel Mtsholi Bhembe utsi kubalulekile kutsi umphakatsi usebentisane ne-maphoyisa babike ngalobu-gebengu.  "Njengemaphoyisa, kungumsebenti wetfu kudlala indzi ma lenkhulu ekucinisekiseni kwekutsi labenta lobugebengu bayabanjwa nalabo labahlukumetekile baphatseke kahle. Sice la umphakatsi kutsi ute utobika emacala ekudlwengulwa esiteshini semaphoyisa lesisedvute nabo,” kusho Bhembe.
Labahlukunyetiwe kufanele babike bugebengu bekuhluku nyetwa ngetemacansi emapho-yiseni kungakandluli emahora lange-72 ngemuva kwekutsi kwenteke lobugebengu.  Bhembe ucwayise labahluku nyetwe ngekudlwengulwa kutsi batfole lusito lwabochwephesha labacwayisa ngetinhlungu ngemuva kwalesehlakalo.  Utsi, “Ungahle utive ungcolile ufune kugeza emahlandla la-mbalwa kantsi ungatfuka wesabe kuphumela ngaphandle. Akukho nakunye kwaloku lokungakajwayeleki noma kungatsi akusikahle. Kufanele ukhumbule kwekutsi kunetinsita letikhona kutsi tikusite”.
I-Greater Rape Intervention Project (GRIP) ingulenye yeti-nhlangano letisita labahlu-kunyetwe ngekudlwengulwa kutsi bahlolelwe ligciwane Lesandvulelangculazi Nengculazi (i-HIV/Aids) naletinye tifo.
Sonhlalakahle we-GRIP  Thandiwe Maseko utsi le-nhlangano inakekela labahlukunyetwe ngekudlwengulwa.
Utsi, “Sibaniketa umgodla wekubanakekela bese laba la bahlukunyetiwe bahlala endlini yetfu yekuphepha badzimate balungele kukhuluma. Sina-bochwephesha labahambembili labanakekela ngalokundlulele futsi bahlala balungele kusita”.

Ungalibika njani licala lekudlwengulwa emaphoyiseni:
■ Kwekucala, yani emtfolamphilo uyohlolwa. Lombiko utawuba yincenye yelifayela lalelicala kantsi kutawusita emaphoyisa kutsi abambe lona lotsintsekako.
■ Hamba uye emaphoyiseni lasedvute nawe uyovula licala. Leliphoyisa litakubuta imininingwane yakho nekutsi kwentekeni kuwe. Phendvula ubatjele liciniso uzame nekukhumbula yonkhe imininingwane ngendlela longakhona ngayo. Kungahle kube yinchubo lebuhlungu, kodvwa lolwatiso lutawusita nakwentiwa luphenyo.
■ Cela imininingwane yekutsintsana nalomphenyi, kute kutsi utsintsane naye kukwatisa ngalokuchubekako. Lomphenyi naye utakutsintsa uma ngabe kudzingeka lolunye lwatiso loludzingekako.

title: Londvolota bobhejane bakitsi
author: More Matshediso
text:
Lombiko, lobuye ufake ikota yekugcina yemnyaka we-2017, ukhomba imphumelelo kulinani lekubopha, kuphenya kanye nekugwe tjwa kwalabo labatingela ngalokungekho emtsetfweni nalabashushumbisa bo bhejane kanye nekuncipha lokuncane kwabobhejane labatingelwe ngalokungekho emtsetfweni eveni lonkhe ngemnyaka we-2017 (1028), uma kucatsaniswa nemnyaka we-2016 (1054).  Ngemnyaka we-2017  kubanjwe emahlandla lasiphohlongo bashushumbi -si betimphondvo tabhejane esikhumuleweni setindiza Semave Ngemave i-OR Ta-mbo, kwaboshwa basolwa labatingela ngalokungekho emtsetfweni bobhejane laba-502, basolwa labatsengisa bobhejane laba-16, lokwenta lenombolo ifike ku-518, le khomba kuncipha kusuka ku-608 ngemnyaka we-2016.
“Lokudzabukisako ku tsi, kuboshwe tisebenti tetfu leti-21 tiboshelwa emacala lahambisana nekutingelwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kwabobhejane ngemnyaka we-2017”, kwasho Indvuna Molewa.
Kucedza kutingela lokungekho emtsetfweni Hulumende nebalingani bakhe basungule tindlela letehlukahlukene tekucedza kutingelwa lokungakavumeleki kwabobhejane, letifaka tinhlelo tekugadza nekuntji ngela emapaki avelonkhe kanye nekusebentisa ithe khnoloji yekugucula simo.
Emkhatsini kwaBimbi dvwane neNgongoni 2017, kwatingelwa ngalukunge kho emtsetfweni bobhejane laba-504 eKruger National Park (e-KNP), lokwehle nge maphesenti langema-24  kunalangema-662 ngemnyaka we-2016.
“Ngenca yemiphumela  yetindlelamasu tetfu tekulwa nekutingela lokungekho e mtsetfweni eKNP sibona kwehla kwelinani letintfo letimayelana nekutingela lokungekho emtsetfweni kulepaki, lelikhomba kutsi beliku-2662 ngemnyaka we-2017 uma licatsaniswa ne-2883 ngemnyaka we-2016. Loku kusho kuncipha nge maphesenti la-7.6,” kwa cinisekisa Indvuna Yelitiko.
Kodvwa-ke, likhulile linani labobhejane labatingelwe ngalokungekho emtsetfweni KwaZulu-Natal, eNyakatfo Kapa, eMpumalanga, eFree State kanye Nasenyakatfo Nshonalanga.
Umtselela kutemnotfoKutingelwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kwabobhejane nekushushunjiswa kweti lwane tasendle kunemtse lela lomubi ekutfutfukiseni umnotfo welive nematfuba emisebenti, lokufaka kutfu tfukisa umnotfo wetint fo letehlukahlukene lofaka ekhatsi umkhakha wetekuvakasha.
“Kulahleka kwalinye lice mbu letilwane letiluphawu lweNingizimu Afrika lelu fana nabhejane, lolungilo lunye lwe-‘Big Five’ kungaba nemtselela lomubi kulinani letivakashi letivakasha eNi ngizimu Afrika. Tivakashi letiningi tivakasha eNingi zimu Afrika kutewubona i-Big Five, lekungubhejane, libhubesi, inyatsi, ingwe kanye nendlovu,” kwasho Litiko Letemvelo kusitatimende salo. Kutingela lokungekho  emtsetfweni kwabobhejane kutsatfwa njengentfo lene bungoti kutekuvikeleka  kwelive, lokungaba nemtse lela kulinani letivakashi le tivakashela lelive, ngaloko hulumende umemetele kutsi kulicala lelicaliswa embili.
Imisebenti lengekho emtse tfweni lehlobene nekutinge lwa kwabobhejane nekushu shunjiswa kwetimphondvo tabo iphumelelisa linani lelincane kumacembu ebuge bengu.
“Loluchungechunge lwe bugebengu lutfola litfu ba ngenca yekubalukhuni kwaloluhlobo lwemacala. Lesikhatsi emacembu ebugebengu atfola tinzuzo, kuphatamiseka likhono lahulumende lekuciniseki sa kutfutfuka kwemnotfo netenhlalo ngenca yekuhle leka kwemacembu ebugebe ngu nemisebenti yawo le gcile kakhulu kumimango yelive lonkhe,” kwacinise kisa litiko.

title: Kubhalisela kuvota kutakwentiwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu 2018
author: More Matshediso
text:
Umphatsi Lomkhulu Wekuvotisa walekhomishini Sy Mamabolo utsite tonkhe titeshi tekuvotisa leti-22 612 titawuvulwa kumphelaso ntfo yamhla ti-10 kuya mhla ti-11 Indlovu 2018, kusuka nge nsimbi ye-8 ekuseni kuyo shaya insimbi ye-5 entsa mbama kute kube lula futsi kuhambisane netidzingo tebavoti tekubuyeketa imini ningwane yabo noma teku bhalisa. Uma ngabe utfutsele endzaweni lensha kusukela wagcina kubhalisela kuvota, kufuneka uphindze ubhalise esigodzini sakho sekuvota lesisha.
Takhamuti taseNingizimu Afrika letineminyaka leli-16 nangetulu futsi letina matisi losemtsetfweni noma simathikhadi tingabhalisela kuvota. Uma ungakabhalisi, angeke uvunyelwe kuvota ngemnyaka we-2019.
Bavoti lababhalisile, imininingwane yabo yelikhe li ingekho kuluhlu lweku vota, banganiketa lwatiso loludzingekako esiteshini sabo sekuvota ngalesikhatsi sekubhalisa.
“Sifuna bavoti bete basebentise lelitfuba,” kwasho Mamabolo.
“Ikhomishini Yelukhetfo nanyalo ayinawo emakheli ebavoti laba-2.8 yetigidzi. Sinalamanye emakheli la-3.5 yetigidzi latsatfwa ‘nje ngalangakapheleli’. Loluhlobo lwemakheli ludzinga kucutju ngulwa nekucinisekiswa  kutsi ingabe kukhona yini leminye imininingwane le khona”, kwangeta Mamabolo. Ikhomishini itfole ema kheli ngekusebentisa tindlela letehlukene, letifaka kubuye ketwa kwemarekhodi, ema fayela kanye nema-akhayivu kubuka nekubhala emakheli laniketwe bavoti kuleminyaka le-20 leyengcile; kugco gcwe emakheli kulolukhetfo lwabomasipala lwemnyaka we-2016; nekungena umuti ngemuti ngembi kwetimphe lasontfo tekubhalisela ku votela lukhetfo lwekuvala tikhewu. Uma kudzingeka, bavoti labatfolwa babhalise etigodzini tekuvota letingakafaneli, basuswa, njengoba kubekiwe kuSigaba 12 (1)(d) Semtsetfo Welukhetfo.
“Sitfole futsi sasebentisa, lapho kunekwenteka kho-na, idatha yemakheli lebuya kuleminye imitfombo yembu so lefana neTelubalobalo taseNingizimu Afrika, I-Eje nsi Yekuvikeleka Kwete nhlalo YaseNingizimu Afrika, I-Telkom, TemaPosi aseNi ngizimu Afrika kanye naku Litiko Lasekhaya”, kwasho Mamabolo.

Bhalisa kungakafiki  Indlovulenkhulu 2018  NgeMphala 2017 Ikhomishini Yelukhetfo yasungula iwebhusayithi (www.elections.org.za) kute bavoti lababhalisile labakhona kufinyelela ku-inthanethi babuyekete noma banikete emakheli abo.Bavoti bangabuye bashayele Sikhungo Sekuchumana (0800 11 8000), kusukela ngeMsombuluko kuya kuLesihlanu ngetikhatsi temsebenti, bacele lusito lolumayelana nalapho kunetiteshi tekuvota khona nekubuta leminye imibuto.
Bavoti lababhalisile bangabuye batfumele  inombolo yamatisi nge-SMS ku: 32810 kute batfole i-SMS lenelikheli lesiteshi sabo sekuvota (i-SMS ibita R1).Yini lekufanele ute nako Uma uya esiteshini sakho sekuvota phatsa matisi wakho lonebhakhodi, simathikhadi lesingumatisi noma sitifiketi samatisi sesikhashana. Utawusitwa kugcwalisa lifomu lekubhalisa lelitawudzinga imininingwane yelikheli lendzawo lohlala kuyo. Loku kutawenta ikhomishini ikhone kukufaka esigodzini sekuvota lesifanele. Sicinisekiso selikheli lohlala kulo ASIDZINGEKI.Mamabolo ucela bonkhe bantfu, emacembu etepolitiki, tinhlangano temmango, tinhlangano letingekho phansi kwahulumende, tishoshovi, betindzaba, baholi bendzabuko kanye netinhlangano tenkholo kutsi bacinisekise kutsi imphelasontfo yekubhalisela kuvota iba yimphumelelo.

title: I-MISA luhlelo lolwasita mhlelidolo bha kutsi aphumelele
author: More Matshediso
text:
Mukhodiwa, longuweku dzabuka esigodzini sase Luheni kuMasipala We ndzawo waseThulamela  eLimpopo, watfola Ticu te Urban and Regional Planning  eNyuvesi yaseVenda nga2016.
Ungulomunye webazu zi beluhlelo lweBapho tfuli Labancane lwe-Eje nti Lesekela Sakhiwonchanti saMasipala (i-MISA), loluhlose kutsi lifunele bapho tfuli labaneticu misebe nti nematfuba ekuceceshwa besemsebentini  emikha kheni yetebucwepheshe le fanele kute kutsi babhaliswe njengetingcweti.
I-MISA luphiko lwahulumende wavelonkhe le lingekhatsi kweLitiko  Letekubusa Ngekubambisana. Yasungulwa ngeNkhwe khweti 2012.
“Ngemuva kwekuphotfu la matikuletjeni nga-2008, kwadzingeka kutsi ngihlale umnyaka munye ekhaya ngi ngafundzi ngibukene ne kutsi ngitayitfola kuphi i mali yekukhokhela inyuve si,” kwasho Mukhodiwa.
Nga-2010, wabhalisa eNyu vesi yaseJozi kepha ngenca yekweswelakala kwetimali akatange akhone kucedza umnyaka wakhe wekucala kwadzingeka kutsi ayishiye phansi inyuvesi.
Ngemnyaka lolandzelako, wabhalisela ticu te-Electrical Engineering N3  ekolishi lendzawo kepha masinyane nje wakubona loko kutsi aku siyo intfo yakhe.
Waphindze-ke futsi wacala phansi wa tfumela ticelo emanyuvesi ngelitsemba lekutsi utawu tfola lusito lwemali.
Ngenhlanhla, iNyuvesi ya seVenda yasemukela sicelo sakhe wabese ucala ticu ta khe te-Urban and Regional Pla nning nga-2012.
“Sikimu Savelonkhe Selusi to Lwetimali Tetitjudeni (i-NSFAS) yakhokhela tifu ndvo temnyaka wami weku cala kwase kutsi i-MISA yangi sita ngemfundzate nasenge nta umnyaka wami wesibili yaphindze futsi yangesekela ngate ngaphotfula tifundvo tami nga-2016,” kwasho yena.
Lomfundzate wakhokhela tonkhe tidzingo temfundvo, kufaka ekhatsi imali yekufundza, emabhuku nekwe kubhalela, indzawo yekuhla la nekudla.
Nga-2017 Mukhodiwa wa -cala kuceceshelwa umsebe nti kuMasipala weNdzawo iPrince Albert kuLitiko Letemisebenti yeMmango Nese kela Litiko.
“Kute kushiywa sikhatsi kangangobe ungete wafika lapho ufuna kufika khona e mphilweni. Ufanele ku tsi wente konkhe lokuse mandleni akho kutsi untjintje simo sakho uphidze futsi u ntjintje timo takho tekuphi la," Mukhodiwa.
Luhlelo lweBaphotfu li Labancane lwe-MISA  kwamanje lunebaphotfuli labange-70, kufaka ekhatsi bahlelidolobha nebahlelisigodzi labange-31, nabonjinela bagezi labange-24, bonjinela betekwakha laba-12 nebaphatsi labatsatfu betekwakha nemiklamo. Bonkhe bakubomasipala kuto tonke tifundza letiyimfica njengencenye yaloluhlelo.
Libambela Lesikhulu Le-siphetse (i-CEO) se-MISA  Ntandazo Vimba utsite lihhovisi lakhe liyasivisisa sidzingo lesikhulu sebantfu labanemakhono obunjinela newekwakha eNingizimu Afrika.
“Asifuni nje kuphela bantfu labasha labaneticu kule mikhakha, kepha sidzinga kucinisekisa kutsi batfola kuceceshwa lokusezingeni lemave emhlaba kantsi futsi batingcweti letibhalisiwe,” kwasho Vimba.
“Bomasipala betfu banesidzingo lesikhulu kakhu lu setingcweti. Sinesibopho lesikhulu sekwenta hulumende wendzawo asebente ngebungcweti, ngemitamo yetfu yekuhlomisa tisebenti ngemakhono," wengeta.


Batali bafanele kutsi badlale indzi ma lenkhulu elukhetfweni lwe-SGB

BAtAlI BANElItfuBA lekudlala indzima lehamba embili ekwenganyelweni kwetikolwa tahulumende ngenhloso yekwenta ncono emazinga nekwenta sikolwa sibe yindzawo lencono yebantfwana babo.

lukhetfo lwemti mba longamela siko lwa (i-SGB) lubanjwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu futsi batali bacelwa kutsi bahla nganyele kute kutsi badla le indzima lenemdlandla emfundvweni yebantfwana babo.
Lukhetfo lutawubanjwa kuto tonkhe tikolwa tahulumende kulo lonkhe lelive.
Indvuna yeLitiko Lete mfundvo Lesisekelo Angie Motshekga utsi lolu lukhetfo lolukhulu kakhulu kulelive, ngaphandle kwelukhetfo lwahulumende wendzawo nelukhetfo lwavelonkhe.  “Lukhetfo lwe-SGB lufaka sandla ekutfutfukeni umcondvo lonemandla webuniyo bemmango. Kuse benta kwetikolwa kuvamise kuba ngulokuncono uma ngabe batali bahlanga nyela ngalokunemdlandla  baphindze futsi banake netindzaba tesikolwa.”Utsite i-SGB inendzima lenkhulu lefanele kutsi iyi dlale ekulinganiseni ti ntfo letifunwa ngubo bonkhe labatsintsekako kwesekela umgomo munye lofananako wekutfola imiphumela ye mfundvo lekahle lephendvu la tidzingo temmango neku tfutfuka kwemnotfo.  I-SGB imelela yonkhe imi khakha yesikolwa, kufa ka ekhatsi batali, bothi shela, tisebenti letingafu ndzisi nebafundzi.  Sikha tsi sekuba sesikhundleni se-SGB yiminyaka lemitsa tfu.
Emandla ekuphatfa sikolwa Umtsetfo weTikolwa wase Ningizimu Afrika unika ema-SGB emandla labonaka lako ekwengamela tikolwa njengencenye yesakhi wo lesibalulekile sentsandvo yelinyenti.
Ngekuhlanganyela kulenchubo yelukhetfo, batali bacinise -kisa kutsi sikolwa sisebentela kahle kakhulu tintfo letifunwa bantfwana babo.
Nanoma nje emalunga e-SGB  akadzingeki kutsi abe neticu temfundvo, batali labanema khono ekugcinweni kwema bhuku, ekubalweni kwetimali kanye nakutinsinta temtsetfo ikakhulu kanye nalabo laba-nesifiso, futsi labanenshise-kelo ngemfundvo, bacelwa kutsi bacabange ngekungenela lolukhetfo.

•	 Kwakha	indlela 	yekutiphatsa 	lefanele	yebafundzi 	lebeka	tinchubo 	tekucondziswa 	kwetigwegwe.
