title: Liculo lesive, umjeka, imiklomelo yesive, siphandla sesive netimpawu tibungata kwehlukahlukana
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Vuk’uzenzele ibuka kubaluleka kwalolusuku nekutsi lisho kutsi ni kitsi sibantfu baseNingizimu Afrika.
Mhla ti-27 kuMabasa 1994 iNi ngizimu Afrika yabamba lukhe tfo lwayo lwekucala lwentsandvo yelinyenti. Hulumende lomusha wakhetfwa ngaphansi kwebuholi baMengameli lowasishiya Nelson Mandela. Kuningi lese kuzuziwe kuleminyaka, kodvwa kuningi lekusafuneka kwentiwe kutfutfukisa live letfu nekuntji ntja timphilo tabo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika.
Lenyanga yaMabasa ayibuki kuphela kutsi sichamuka kuphi silive, kodvwa isikhatsi lapho iNingizimu Afrika ibungata emacawe nemacawekati ayo ngekuwaklomelisa ngemiklomelo yesive. Loku miklomelo lesezingeni lelisetulu kakhulu leniketwa ngulelive, nguMengameli, aniketa takhamuti talelive nebantfu bemave angaphandle labahlonishwa kakhulu.
Umtsetfosisekelo WaseNingizimu AfrikaUmtsetfosisekelo wabhalwa ngekulandzela Sigaba 5 Semtsetfo -sisekelo wesikhashana (Umtsetfo 200 wemnyaka we-1993) lowacala kuvunywa Mkhandlu Wemtsetfosisekelo mhla ti-8 Inkhwekhweti 1996. Wasayinwa waba ngumtsetfo mhla ti-10 Ingongoni 1996.
Timpawu tetfu tesive INingizimu Afrika yehlukile ku lamanye emave ngenca yekutsi singabungata kuhlukahlukana kwetfu ngekusebentisa timpawu tesive kanye nemjeka sesive, liculo lesive saseNingizimu Afrika kanye nesiphandla sesive.
Umjeka weNingizimu Afrika uhlukile. Wadvwetjwa ngilowo bekasisebenti sekusungulwa kwetiphandla tesive, i-South A frican State Herald, Fred Brownell, wacala kusetjentiswa mhla ti-27 Mabasa 1994.
Lemibala yalomjeka ayisho lutfo ngakoke akukho kumelelwa kwetintfo tsite temhlaba leticondzaniswa nalemibala yalomjeka.
Loluphawu lwa-‘V’ kulomjeka lumelele kuhlangana kwetintfo letiningi teNingizimu Afrika nekubamba ngekubumbana indlela leya embili.
Kuphakamisa umjeka Uma lomjeka ubekwe ngaloku vundlile ebondzeni, umbala lobovu kufanele ube sesincele saloyo lobukako bese kutsi lapho ucunyekwa khona kube ngenhla. Uma ubekwe wema wabuka etulu, loko locunyekwa ngako kufanele kube sesandleni sesincele saloyo lobukako bese kutsi umbala lobovu ube setulu. Uma umjeka ubekwe eceleni noma emuva kwalokhulumako, kufanele ubekwe ecaleni lesekudla laloyo lokhulumako. Uma ubekwe kulenye indzawo lapho kunemhlangano khona, kufanele ube ngasesandleni sekudla salabo labahleli phansi labalalelako.
Siphandla Sesive  Siphandla sesive, lephindze satiwe ngekutsi liphawu lesive, siluphawu lolukhulu lolugcamile lwesive.
Siphandla sesive siyincenye lenkhulu Yesingcivito Sesive.
Idokhumenti leneSingcivito Se sive ibaluleke kakhulu ikhomba emandla ekuphatsa lamakhulu, loku kuchaza kutsi ivunywe nguMengameli weNingizimu Afrika.
Siphandla sesive saseNingizi mu Afrika sasungulwa ngeLusu ku Lwenkhululeko ngemnyaka we-2000. Tintfo letikuso tihlelwe ngendlela lekhombisa kusimama nekubaluleka lokukhulu.
Sicubulo lesikusiphandla sesi ve, “!ke e: /xarra //ke” lesibha lwe ngelulwimi lwema-Khoisan, sichaza kubumbana kwebantfu labahlukahlukene.
Liculo LesiveLiculo letfu Lesive lihlukile ngoba liculwa ngetilwimi letine.
Liculo lesive lamenyetelwa ngemnyaka we-1997. Lifinyeti we, lahlanganisa emaculo esive lamabili (‘Nkosi Sikelel’ iAfrika’ kanye ne-‘The Call of South Africa’/’Die Stem van Suid-Afrika’); laculwa emkhatsini kwemnyaka we-1994 nemnyaka we-1997.Timphawu tetfu tesive nguleti:
•	Silwane	sesive,	inswephe
•	 Imbali	yesive	,	sicalaba	lesikhulu
•	 Sihlahla	sesive,	umkhoba
•	 Inyoni	yesive,	indvwe
•	 Inhlanti	yesive,	inhlanti	yehlalejuni

title: I-App yetigitjelwa temmango taseGauteng
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Gauteng on the Move  itawususa  kungabata loku khona nawusebentisa titfutsi temmango, ngobe inika bagibeli lwatiso mbamba lwesikhatsi, ishejuli yesigitjelwa kanye neti ndleko tekuhamba nge-Gautrain‚ Metrobus‚ A Re Yeng‚ Rea Vaya‚ Metrorail‚ nge-Gautrain Bus Ser vices‚ Johannesburg City Sight seeing Bus‚ Tshwane Bus Services kanye netinsita tematekisi.
Akhuluma ngesikhatsi kwe tfulwa le-App ehhovisi lalabo labayisungulile leliseMidrand esikhatsini lesisandza kwendlu la, Indvuna Yetekutfutsa Ye sifundza saseGauteng Ismail Vadi utsite litiko lisibonile vele sidzingo sekutsi kube khona tebuchwepheshe letihlakaniphile kanye neluhlelo lwetekutfutsa loluhlakaniphile njengalokufaka ligalelo ekutfutfukisweni kwete kutfutsa.
“Hulumende weSifundza saseGauteng wente lutjalotimali lwesikhatsi sakhe, lwemitamo kanye nemitfombolusito  ekwakh iweni kwalesihleliluhambo kute kutsi kubelula kutsi bagibeli bakhone kuchumana lula  netinhlobo tetitfutsi letinkhulu talesifundza.
"Sesivele siyawabona emandla  etebuchwepheshe bekucamba lokusha lahlela kabusha tigi tjelwa temmango. Kute kunga bata kutsi tingucuko tebuchwe pheshe emhlabeni wonkhe ticala tingucuko letinkhulu emkhakheni wetekutfutsa te mmango, natsi kufanele kutsi sitemukele futsi sititayele leti ngucuko,” kwasho yena njalo.
Vadi ucinisekise kutsi sifundza sitawuchubeka ngekusebentisa umcondvo lomusha, lucwaningo kanye nentfutfuko kugcugcutela kutsi kube nesifundza lesenta tintfo ngekuhlakanipha kute kube nemphumelelo nekufinyelela  ti nsita tetigitjelwa.Nasebayidvonsile ku-in thanethi, le-App itawusita labo labayisebentisako kutsi bahlele luhambo lwabo ngekutsi bakhe tse indlela yekuhamba laba yifunako, sikhatsi sekuhamba kanye nalokunye labangakhetsa kuko, njengeluhambo lolufisha nalolushiphe kakhuluUmfundzi waseJohannesburg nalomunye webagibeli Glen Dlamini batsi le-App itakwenta tinkhulungwane tebagibeli kutsi bangasakhatsateki nabafuna kuhamba.
“Impela lena yi-App lemanga lisako sibili. Ingumtamo lo mkhulu wahulumende futsi ita tintjintja timphilo ikakhulu teba ntfu labasha njengami labahamba basuka eSoweto baya eNyuvesi yaseJohannesburg e-Auckland Park malanga onkhe.
“Lokungenani njalo sengitawu khona kuhlela luhambo lwami ncono, macondzana netimali, kanye nekubala sikhatsi sekuha mba lengitasitsatsa sekuya lapho ngifuna kuya khona.
“Ngicabanga kutsi le-App  iyamangalisa sibili nekutsi mine njengemuntfu lengi ngasuye walesifundza, itangisita kakhulu nangifuna kutiyela lapho ngifuna kuya khona,” kwasho Kha nyo Malunga ngesikhatsi acocisa na neVuk’uzenzele eBlairgowrie.
“Nangabe ngite lapha ngitele luhlolokhono lwemsebenti, ngi -tawukhona kuhlela ncono kanye nekwati kutfola indlela,” kweng eta yena.
Le-App iyasebentiseka kubo makhalekhikhini labafanana ne-Android nema-iPhone, latfo lakala etitolo letahlukahlu kene letitsengisa ema-App.

title: Kulwa nesomiso lesikhulu
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Somiso sikhatsi lesidze sekuna kwemvula lencane kakhulu lokuholela ekutseni kuswelakale emanti.
Ngekusho kwaDkt. Mathieu Roualt, longusolwati kuLitiko Letekufundza Ngelwandle eNyuvesi yaseKapa, timbangela letinkhulu tesomiso yi-El Niño nekuntjintja kwesimo selitulu.
“I-El Niño sehlakalo semvelo lesenteka ngetikhatsi letitsite lesibuya njalo emva kweminya ka lemitsatfu kuya kulesihlanu futsi singahlala iminyaka lemi bili. Lesimo senyusa emazinga ekushisa elwandle iPacific kanye nelwandle lwaseNdiya, loko kubese kubangela kutsi kube netimo tesomiso,” kwasho yena njalo.
Kugucuka kwesimo selitulu kuchazwa njengekuntjintja kwetimo telitulu mhlaba wo nkhe nome esifundzeni, lokuyi ntfo leyacala emkhatsini kwaya ngasekupheleni kwemnya kalikhulu we-20 kubangwa kakhulu kwenyuka kwemazi nga  esikhutsa emoyeni lesikhi citeka uma kusetjentiswa  emafutsa emvelo.
“Kuleminyaka lelikhulu leye  ngcile i-Afrika lengaseningi zimu ibukene nekugucuka kwesimo selitulu iminyaka ngeminyaka, lokuholele eso misweni lesikhulu kanye ne kutsikameteka tindlela teku hlalisana kwetintfo letiphilako taselwandle kanye netase mhlabatsini. Letingucuko tine mtselela lomubi etimbonini tekulima, kutilondvolotama nti nasetinhlantini kanye-ke nemnotfo ngebubanti bawo.
Tiphindze futsi tibe nemtselela lomubi ekugeleteni kwemanti emifuleni kanye nasetitfonjeni temvelo kanye nekungena elwa ndle kudla lokungumsoco ,” kuchaza yena njalo Dkt. Roualt.
Lemitselela lemibi ivakala kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika ngobe live letfu linemvula lencane ngemnyaka lelinga niselwa ku-avareji yemamilili tha lange-450, nakucatsaniswa ne-avareji yemhlaba wonkhe lengemamililitha lange-860.
Yini imitselela lemibi yesomiso?NgeNdlovulencane, Litiko Letekubusa Ngekuhla nganyela Netendzabuko  (i-COGTA)  basihlela kabusha batsi lesomiso asisasiyo inhlekelele yesifundza kuphela kepha seyinhlekelele yavelonkhe.
“Ngemuva kwekuhlola futsi bukhulu nemtse lela lomubi kakhulu walesomiso  lesichu bekako, lesesichu bekele kulokungenani etifundzeni letintsatfu, labalawula tinhlekele le baphindze futsi basihlela kabusha lesomiso batsi sesiyi nhlekelele yavelonkhe nyalo,” kwasho inhloko yeSikhungo Savelonkhe Lesilawula Tinhle kelele, Dkt. Mmaphaka Tau.
Nanome nje kulukhuni kukala imitselela lemibi yalesomiso emnotfweni, kodvwa kube nemtselela lomkhulu lomubi emkhakheni kwetekulima.
ENshonalanga Kapa, loku sifundza sesibili lesikhicita kakhulu kutekulima talelive, kwaphela imisebenti lelinga niselwa kule-21 000 ekoteni ye sitsatfu kulomnyaka lophelile. Kukhicitwa kwakolo kwehla ngemaphesenti lange-47 nga2017 loko kungabanga kushoda kwemalitha latigidzi letinge-90 eliwayini langatsengiselwa emave angephandle kumbe khona lapha eveni.
Kweswelakala kwemanti kutawuba nemtselela lomubi ekuhanjisweni kwekungcola ngemanti, ekunakekeleni te mphilo kanye netekuvakasha.
Yini lokwentiwako kute kubukanwe nalesimo?Bomasipala labakhahlabetwe ngulesomiso sebacale kusebe ntisa tindlela leticinile tekonga emanti kubahlali kanye nasema bhizinisini.
Tihlantimanti letikhipha sawo ti  emantini aselwandle, tinhle lo tekulungisa emaphayiphi, kusetjentiswa futsi kwemanti kanye nekudvonsa emanti nge phasi kwemhlaba sekubonakale njengetisombululo letingase tjentiswa kulenkinga yesomiso, njengaloku vele leminye yale miklamo seyivele seyisetiga beni tekutsi iphotfulwe.

title: Lusha luyalwemukela luhlelo lwe-YES
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
YES, lesandza kuvulwa ngu Mengameli Cyril Ramapho sa, ihlose kulungiselela lusha kutsi batfole umsebenti iba nikete emakhono ebuchwe pheshe ladzingekako kute kuciniswe ku tfutfukiswa kwemno tfo. Temane uyachaza kweku tsi ngemuva kwekutfola ticu nga-2016 akazange akhone kufaka ticelo temsebenti ngoba bekangenalo lwati lwemsebenti loludzingeka ko.
“Bekulukhuni kufuna umse benti ngaphandle kwekuba nelwati lwemsebenti. Nge nhlahla ngahlangabetana ne Lulaway Recruitment Age ncy lesebentisana ne-YES, kantsi banginiketa litfuba lokufundzela umsebenti e msebentini, i-internship.”I-YES ingumtamo loyinhla nganisela wahulumende, ti nhlangano tetisebenti nema bhizinisi kutsi banikete ba ntu labasha baseNingizimu Afrika labasigidzi misebenti lekhokhelwayo kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako.
Lucwaningo lolwenti we lukhombisa kutsi lwati lwemsebenti lwemnyaka munye lolubhala ku-CV , nencwadzi yereferensi, ku tfutfukisa ematfuba emuntfu lomusha ekutfola umsebenti emahlandla lamatsatfu.
Temane ungete ngekutsi uyawutsandza umsebenti wakhe, ikakhulukati ngoba usita lolunye lusha kutfo la imisebenti njengoba ayi intern lecashako.
Ngalesikhatsi kuvulwa i-YES Mengameli Rama phosa watiswa kulabantfu  labasha bekucala laba-100  labatawube bacashwe yi ABSA, Investec, Netcare, Sasol ne-Unilever ngaphansi kwa loluhlelo.
“Lomtamo siwubona  njengesisekelo sinye save lonkhe lesikhulu nalesifa ka ekhatsi konkhe lesizama kwakha ematfuba elusha.
Lesinye sisekelo lesise mkhatsini ngulokutfutfu kiswa kwalamakhono nelwa ti lwelusha,” kusho Menga meli Ramaphosa.
Ucele bosomabhizinisi la basebancane kutsi badlale indzima yabo njengoba bane tikhala letinyenti temsebenti washo nekutsi emabhizinisi lamakhulu angeke akhona kutsatsa lusha lolwanele awodvwa.
Ngekusho kwa-CEO weYES Tashmia Ismail-Saville, kubantfu labatigidzi leti ngu-15.5 eNingizimu Afrika labaneminyaka yebudzala lesemkhatsini we-18 ne-34, tigidzi letingu-5.8 abase benti.
“I-YES ihlose kuniketa leyo ncenye yelusha lwetfu, leba nganakwa nguletindlela le kucashwa ngato kwanyalo kulelive, litfuba lekucala lekutfola umsebenti losezi ngeni lelisetulu nalokahle kanye nelwati lwemsebenti babe bakhokhelwa,” kusho Ismail-Saville.
Njengenzuzo lengetiwe kumabhizinisi lasemanca ne, labo labacasha bantfu labasha labamnyama, la baneminyaka yebudzala lesemkhatsini we-18 ne-29, batawulungela kutsi bazuze Sibonelelo Semtselo Weku casha lesilingana na-R1 000 ngenyanga.
Lusha lwe-YES kufanele:
• Lube neminyaka le-18 ne-34 budzala.
• Bangasebenti sikhatsi  lesindlula tinyanga letisitfupha.
• Kube ngulabamnyama (labamnyama bomdza bu, Emakhaladi noma Emandiya).
• Uma kwenteka tinka pani tifisa kutfola Sibo nelelo Semtselo Weku casha, lolusha kufanele lube neminyaka lese mkhatsini we-18 ne-29.
Lolusha lutawuhola malini?Lomholo ulindzeleke kutsi ubekwe ngekusebentisa sili nganiso semholo lolizinga ncane wavelonkhe lesingu R3 500  ngenyaga, lokufaka ekha tsi kuceceshwa nekusekelwa lokuhambisanako. Silinganiso lesetayelekile sibita R55 000 ngemnyaka.

title: Kunelulwimi lolusemtsetfweni lolusha loluhlongotwako eNingizimu Afrika
author: Neo Semono
text:
Mengameli Cyril Rama phosa wente lesimeme telo ngalesikhatsi semci mbi wekubeka Indlovukati  yeBalobedu eMokwakwa ila Stadium eBolobedu,  Ga-Modjadji eLimpopo.
I-Khelobedu lulwimi  lolukhulunywa sive seBa lobedu lapho khona, Masala nabo Modjadji oyiNdlovuka ti yeLitulu lengakabekwa leneminyaka leli-13 budzala, atawutsatsa lesihlalo nakaba neminyaka le-18, ngemuva kwekutsi abekwe njenge Ndlovukazi Modjadji VII.Utawuphotfula ngekuha mbisana nemihambo  nemasiko esive seBalobedu.
“Loku yincophamlandvo Mama Winnie Madikize la-Mandela bekatatigcabha ngayo. Lesi sihlalo sekuca la futsi ngiso sodvwa seBu ndlovukati kulelive nakule livekati,” kusho Mengameli Ramaphosa.
Mengameli Ramapho sa ubuye wacinisekisa ku tinikela kwahulumende  ekubuyiseleni kuhlonipha nesitfunti sebuholi bendza buko.
Bukhosi besive seBalobedu bamukelwe ngalokusemtse tfweni ngenyanga yeNdlovu lenkhulu nga-2016 ngemuva kwekutsi i-Commission on Traditional Leadership Di sputes and Claims (i-CT LDC) yenta lucwaningo ngesimo sesive seBalobedu, ngekusho kwaticelo letile tfwe ku-CTLDC.
“Hulumende utinikele  ekuphumeleliseni letigaba temtsetfo teSahluko se-12 kuMtsetfosisekelo, ikakhu lukati lokubuyiswa kwesi tfunti salesikhungo sebuho li bendzabuko embusweni wentsandvo yelunyenti loho lwa ngeMtsetfosisekelo,” ku sho Mengameli Ramaphosa.
Utsite kuvunyelwa ko muntfu losikati kutsi abekwe njengeNdlovukati  eNingi zimu Afrika kukhombi sa kutinikela kulomgomo wekulingana ngekwebulili, ngalesikhatsi kubuye kuna kwe lendzima yebuholi ledla lwa bomake kuyo yonkhe imi khakha yemphilo.
“Baholi bendzabuko  banendzima lebalulekile le kufanele bayidlale ekwa kheni ummango longenabu phuya, longenako kuswe lakala kwemsebenti na lonekulingana. Baholi betfu bendzabuko kudzingeka ku tsi bahambe phambili eku lweni nekubuyisela emalu ngelo nesitfunti sebantfu ba kitsi.” Uchubeke wagcizelela  lokubaluleka kwalendzima ledlalwe baholi bendzabuko ekubuyiseni umhlaba kubani kati lebafanele.
“Badzinga kucinisekisa kwekutsi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo labawusebe ntako kantsi labo labatawu niketwa umhlaba kufanele babe netindlela tekuwusebe nta,” kusho Mengameli Rama phosa.
Bantfu labalinganiselwa ku tigidzi leti-25 labahlala ema phandleni bakwenta loku ngaphansi kwebuholi beba holi bendzabuko.  

Ingabe bewati?
• Sive seBalobedu satsintseka ngalesikhatsi nga1972 leNdlovukati yeliTulu  Makoma Modjadji yatsatselwa emandla ayo nesihlalo sayo sehliswa satsatselwa bukhosi.
• Tindzawo tasemaphandleni netindvuna lebetingaphansi kwembuso wakhe tafakwa ngaphansi kwetigodzi lebetatiwa ngeLebowa neGazankulu kwase kubulawa kanjalo lamasiko lanotsile nemnyombo yalendlovukati lebewukhona eminyakeni lengema-400 leyandlula.

title: Litiko Letasekhaya limemetela kulwa nemigca lemidze
author: More Matshediso
text:
Ngekusho kweNdvuna  yeTasekhaya Malusi Gigaba imigca lemidze beyibangwa linani lelisetulu lebantfu,  indzawo lengakaneli yelihhovisi lelingembili, tinkinga tebuholi kanye nekuvalwa kwemahho visi ngaboMgcibelo.
Kulungisa lenkinga, litiko liba la linani lemahhovisi alo eveni lonkhe kutfola kutsi ngukutiphi tindzawo lapho kudzingeka kwentiwa ncono khona tinsi takalo.
“Sitawusungula luklayo lwe kwenetiswa kwetakhamuti, sente kutsi sikhungo sekuchumana se takhamuti sisebente ngemphu melelo, kutfola sisombululo setakhamuti letingena tinga kalindzelwa kanye nendzawo yelihhovisi lelingembili, kubuka nekutsi ngeke yini kube nelu hlelo lolusha lwekusebenta emashifu, kulungisa loluhlelo langcondvomshini lolungakati nti, kwenyusa lizinga lekuvaka sha emahhovisi etfu kwemame nenja lamakhulu, kwenta ncono kuhamba kwemsebenti kanye nekwengeta lizinga lekuchu manana netakhamuti,” kwasho yona njalo Indvuna.
Lamasu ekwenta tintfo atawu cala kusebenta njengetinya tselo tekungenelela tethemu lemfisha, lesemkhatsini kanye neyesikhatsi lesidze.
Indvuna ichaze kutsi leti nsayeya ngeke tisonjululwe ngekusebentisa tinyatselo tekungenelela letilungisa tintfo ngekushesha futsi icele umma ngo kutsi ubeketele ngesikhatsi litiko lisacala kutisebentisa.
“Sitimisele ngekwenta konkhe lokusemandleni etfu kulwa nemphi yekuma emigceni, nanome kunetinkinga telitiko kanye naletinye tinsayeya,” kwasho Indvuna Gigaba.
Ngembikwekumemetelwa kwemasu ekwenta tintfo litiko litsite akube khona umbiko wekuhlola kutfola kutsi lemigca singayilawula njani ncono kanye nekwenta ncono tinsitakalo talo.
Lomkhuba waphawula nge tinhlelo tengcondvomshini letingakatinti, inchubo lete  imphumelelo yekuhamba kwemsebenti kanye netindle lamasu tekuchumana letinga hambisani letiholela ekutseni kube netakhamuti letingane tiseki kanye nekuba khona kwemigca lemidze.
Ngekusho kweNdvuna, lama phuzu lalandzelako enta lenki nga kutsi ichubekiseleke embili: 
■ Kulawula lokungekho ezingeni kulamanye emahhovisi
■ Kungasebentiseki ngemphu melelo kwetisebenti
■ Kuswelakala kweluhlelo lwekucasha 
■ Kungalawuli ngemphumelelo imigca 
■ Kuchubeka ngasikhatsi sinye kweluhlelo lolwentisa bantfu kanye nalolo lolutentekelako 
■ Kungasatjalaliswa ngekuli ngana kwemahhovisi  ngekubuka bantfu labakhona 
• Lwatiso lolungasilo  lolumayelana nekutsi ema bhuku amatisi lanebhakodi angeke asabakhona.
• Timphawu letingekho ezingeni emahhovisi.
Kunemahhovisi etasekhaya la-184 kuphela lakhona kutsatsa lwatiso bukhoma kanye neti teshi tekusebenta letinge-411 eveni lonkhe.
Ngulamahhovisi la-184 kuphe la lasebenta ticelo kanye neku landvwa kwemakhadi amatisi nemapasipoti.
Litiko lenta kabusha emahho visi lange-78 langubomaha mbanendlwana futsi kune siciniseko sekutsi atawusa tjalaliswa kulolonkhe live lase Ningizimu Afrika ngesikhatsi sesigamu sesibili sa-2018.

UTSINJEBEWATI?

Kusukela nje kwacala kukhishwa kwemakhadi amatisi nga-2013, emahhovisi eLitiko leTasekhaya asakhiphe emakhadi langetulu kwetigidzi letiyimfica.

title: Umsebenti weNingizimu Afrika kufundzisa lusha
author: More Matshediso
text:
Indvuna Pandor utsite ngu msebenti walelive kwesekela leyo mindeni lephuyile.
Bekakhuluma nebetindzaba lapho avete khona inchubo yekucala kunikwa kwemfu ndvo yamahhala lapha eNingi zimu Afrika.
Indvuna Pandor umemetele ngalokusemtsetfweni kutsi Hulumende wengete nge lutjalotimali lwetigidzigidzi leti-R7.166 esikhwameni semifundzate yebantfwana bemindeni lephuyile nalehola imiholo lemincane labangena emanyuvesi nasema-TVET kulomnyaka.
Indvuna Pandor ucinisekise kutsi tigidzigidzi le-R4.581 ti bekelwe eceleni labo bafundzi labafanele kungena enyuvesi netigidzi le-R2.585 tibeke lwe bafundzi basemakolishi e-TVET.
Nga-2017 hulumende  umemetele kutsi imfundvo lephakeme itawubamahhala kubafundzi labaphuyile kanye nalabo labavela emindenini lehola ngemnyaka umholo lohlanganisiwe losengaka dvonswa letinye timali loyima lingena le-R350 000.Labafundzi basekelwa ngesikimu semfundzate lese ngetiwe, lesitsatsa sikhundla semalimboleko yaphambilini kanye nesikimu lesingasiwo umfundzate lophelele lesi niketwa Sikimu Savelonkhe Sekusita Bafundzi Ngetimali (i-NSFAS).
“Luphakelo lwekucala lwe-NSFAS lwekusekela bafundzi labaphuyile base manyuvesi nasemakolishi e-TVET lutakwenyuka kusuke la etigidzigidzini le-R9.849 nga2017/18 luye etigidzigidzini letingeR35.321 nga-2020/21.
“Loku kusho kutsi kune sidzingo sekutfutfukisa tinhle lo tekusebenta ngemphumelelo ku-NSFAS. Ngaleyo ndlela-ke sente luphakelo lolwengetiwe lwetigidzi leti-R105 kuLolu hlakamsebenti Lwetinchitfo mali Lwethemu Lesekhatsi kute kusitwe i-NSFAS kutsi yandzise futsi icinise emandla ayo ekukhona kusebenta,” kwasho yona njalo Indvuna.
Bafundzi labafanele, kuyo yonkhe iminyaka yekufundza kwabo, lababhalise emakolishi e-TVET ahulumende batawu tfola umfundzate kukhokhela imali yekufundza kanye neti nsita tekufundza.
Lokwenyuswa kwemali yekusita nga-2018/19 kuta wucinisekisa kutsi bafundzi laba-458 875 batfola imifu ndzate.
Bafundzi basemakolishi e-TVET labalinganiselwa letinge-50 480, labafanele ku tfola sibonelelo setekuhamba, sendzawo yekuhlala kanye nesekudla, batawukweseke lwa; bese kutsi labo labati 82 600 batawufaneleka kutsi batfole lusitotimali lweteku hamba.
Indvuna itsite loluphakelo lwetimali lolusha lulindzeleke kutsi lusekele tikhala letili nganiselwa kuleti-83 200 ku leto letinge-208 000 (ema-40%) letikhona talabo labangena emanyuvesi kwekucala nga2018.

title: Luhlelo lwekudala imisebenti luvutsa emalangabi
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Ngekwesekelwa ngetima li Litiko Letemvelo, loluhlelo luwela ngaphasi kweLuhlelo lweTemisebenti yaHulumende leyeNgetiwe (i-EPWP).Luniketa litsemba kulusha lolunyenti lolungatfoli imisebenti futsi selube nemphumelelo lencomeka kakhulu ekuvikeleni nasekulawuleni imililo yesiganga, lunciphisa lifutse lwayo.
Loluhlelo lucasha bantfu la bangetulu kwalaba-5 000 la bavela emimangweni lephuyile luphindze futsi lubaceceshe kutekwati ngemlilo, temfundvo kanye nekuwucindzetela nala manye emakhono, njengelusito lwekucala, kubata, kupheka, temphilo netekuphepha kanye netekuchumana.
Sikhulu setekuchuma se-WOF Lebogang Maseko uchaze watsi loluhlelo luhlose bantfu labasha luphindze futsi lucasha bantfu labakhubatekile kutsi base bente etikhungweni talo letisetifundzeni.
“Sigcizelelaka kakhulu kutfutfukisa emakhono nekuni ka lusha imisebenti, lusha lolu -sha loluvela etikolweni temabanga laphakeme noma lolusandza kuphotfula etikhungweni temfundvo lephakeme. Kubaceceshwa balohlulelo, labange ma-94% ngebantfu labasha, la bange-31% bomake bese kutsi labayi-3% ngebantfu labakhu batekile,” washo acinisekisa.
Lorraine Mokoena (lone minyaka yebudzala le-31) wase Mpumalanga ungulomunye webaceceshwa lowazuza kulo luhlelo. Bekaloku asebenta lapha ka-WOF yonkhe leminyaka le-11 leyendlulile.
Ngemuva kwekuphotfula ma tikuletjeni washikashikeka imi nyaka lemibili angatfoli umse benti. Sisi wakhe wabese umtjela ngaloluhlelo lwe-WOF.
“Inchubo yekufaka sicelo beyimatima. Kuphila nekucina kwemtimba nguyona ndlela lebaluleke kakhulu yekukhetsa labatawungena kulomsebenti futsi baceceshwa bafakwa eti gabeni tabo. Ungaphumelela kusivivinyo ubese udzingeka kutsi uphumelele nakuluhlolo lwetemphilo kubese-ke kuba ngukhona kucala lucecesho lwekucisha umlilo," kwasho yena.
Mokoena wacala alijuniya lesicimamlilo futsi sewusebente ngekutikhandla wakhuphu ka waba ngumholi lomkhulu welicembu lebacimimlilo, uhola licembu lebacimimlilo laba-18.
“Lomsebenti uyintjintjile imphilo yami. Ngimi kuphela lo nesibopho salokuya etfunjini se bantfwana bakitsi nebantfwana bami lababili. Manje ngiyakhona kondla umndeni wami ngiyise nebantfwana bami esikolweni,” kwasho Mokoena.”Ukuvumile kutsi lomsebenti wekucima umlilo ngalokwetayelekile ungumsebenti wemadvodza futsi sewufundze kutsi acine abe nemandla ku lomkhakha.
Mokoena uphokophele ekube ni ngumphatsi wemisebenti yemacembu kuleminyaka lemibili letako. Loku kutawume-nta kutsi abe nesibopho sawo onkhe emacembu e-WOF lase Mphumalanga.
Njengoba naku sesifikelwe sikhatsi semililo, Mokoena unikete lamasu ekuvikela imililo yesiganga lalandzelako: 
• Ungalumeki imililo  endzaweni levulekile uma ngabe angeke ukhone kuwu lawula.
• Yenta siciniseko sekutsi une lusito netisetjentiswa letenele tekubukana nato tonkhe timo.
• Ungawushiyi umlilo unga kagadvwa.
• Caphela simo selitulu. Imililo ayikafaneli kutsi ilunyekwe etindzaweni letivulekile ema langeni lashisa kakhulu noma lahhusha kakhulu.

title: Libutfo letemvelo livikela bobhejanes
author: Dale Hes
text:
Nyawo, loyincenye yemklamo wekulandzela temvelo lochutjwa yi-EPWP , ukholelwa ekutsi kubalulekile kufundzisa imimango mayelana  nekunakekelwa kwemvelo.
“Sifanele kutsi sihambe siyo fundzisa imimango futsi siyente ivisise kutsi kungani kubalule kile kutsi kongiwe imvelo. Ngu lapho-ke ummango utawuvisisa kutsi indzima ledlalwa tilwane tasendle", kwasho yena.
Loluhlelo, loluhlomisa bantfu labasha baseNingizimu Afri ka ngemakhono labawadzingako kute bakwati kusebenta etindzaweni tekonga imvelo nekuhlalisana kwetilwanyana netihlahla, sewente sicinise -ko sekutsi Nyawo uyakhona kunakekela umndeni wakhe.
“Luphahla lwendlu lelikhaya lemndeni wami manje seyifule lwe kahle kakhulu, alusavuti, futsi loko kungenca yemsebenti wami. Kuyangitfokotsa kutsi ngatfola lelitfuba," kwasho yena.
Indvuna yeLitiko Letemve lo Dkt. Edna Molewa sewetse balandzele ligama lebujaha le litsi 'libutfo letemvelo' ngoba badlala umsebenti lomkhulu ekulweni nebugebengu, njenge kutingela kubulawe bobhejane ngalokungekho emtsetfweni.
“Kulomnyaka lophelile kwakhishwa balandzeleli be temvelo la-1 659 bayiswa etindzaweni letihamba embili ekutingelweni kubuye kubu lawe bobhejane ngalokungekho emtsetfweni kute bayokweleke lela ekuvikelweni kwemvelo.
Batawutfola emakhono ekuba ngemancusa abobhejane ku letindzawo leti", kwasho yena.
Nyawo bekayincenye yelicembu lelabamba umtingeli longekho emtsetfweni e-Umkhuze Game Reserve, lokwaholela ekutsi lesigebengu silahlwe li -cala lebugebengu.
“Ngatigcabha ngemitamo yami futsi lelicala leli, kuba nelwati lolubanti ngekunakekelwa kwemvelo kwasita njengo ba kwaholela ekutsini abanjwe lomtingeli longekho emtsetfweni,” kwasho yena.
Loluhlelo lusebente kakhu lu ekusiteni kutsi kubanjwe, kuphenywe kubuye kugwetjwe ngemphumelelo batingeli labangekho emtsetfweni; lunciphise kutingelwa kwetilwane tasendle ngalokungekho emtsetfweni nge-50%;  luphindze futsi lwacinisekisa kwehla nge76% kwelizinga lekwetsiywa kwetilwane.

Kusuka ebuphuyeni nekutsi bameye ngenca yekusebenta epulasini Mahlatse Matlakane (loneminyaka yebudzala le20) manje ungumlimi wephepha leluhlata satjani lomama tsekako.
Mahlatse wacala ngeku volontiya kusebenta ngetimphelansontfo nangemaholide esikolwa epulasini lendzawo lelilima iphepha leluhlata satjani aneminyaka le-15 kute asite make wakhe ngekutsi batfole lokuya etfunjini.
Matlakane uhlala kaGa-Moi simane eBuchum ngaphandle nje kwePolokwane eLimpopo.
Utsite nanoma nje manje atitfokotela titselo tekusebenta kwakhe ngekutikhandla kodvwa bekungalula ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
“Mine nebantfwana bakitsi sikhule kamatima. Bontsanga yami bebahlekisa ngami ngesikhatsi ngicala kusebenta epulasini futsi batsi kusebenta epulasini kwebantfu labanga kafundzi.
“Loku bekungephula umoya kepha bengifuna kwati kulima kute kutsi ngichubeke nako njengemsebenti wami lengi wukhetsile,” kwasho yena. Ngesikhatsi Matlakane asatfole likhono wakhulumisana nemnikati walelipulasi Johan Nel lapho bekavolontiya kho na mayelana nekuhlanyela yakhe inhlanyelo aphindze alime bophepha.
Nel wamnika emahektha lamabili emhlaba epulasini lakhe.
“Ngamangaliswa kutsi tinhlanyelo letincane kangaka tingaba titjalo letitsela bo phepha labaluhlata satjani labakhulu kangaka. Kubona kutsi titjalo tinakekelwa kanja -ni ngekutsi tifakwe bomanyo lo kute kulawulwe tilokatana kwangenta kutsi kulima ngikutsandze kakhulu kunakuca la. Ngavele ngati khona lapho kutsi loku nguyona yintfo lengifuna kuyenta," kwasho Matjakane.
Ngemuva kwekuphotfula matikuletjeni wakhe Matlakane wabambelela kuya  enyuvesi ngemnyaka munye nanoma nje besebamemukele eNyuv esi yaseJozi (i-UJ) kutsi uyofundza tifundvo temtsetfo.  Wabuyela emuva kuNel wayomcela lolunye futsi lusito loluyenti wabese umbonisa kutsi acele sikhulu sendzawo kutsi singete samupha yini umhlaba.
Ngemuva kwekubona inchubekelembili yakhe epulasini laNel sikhulu sendzawo sabese simupha umhlaba longemahektha lange-40 epulasini iBabirwa Ba Tau Ya Tswala lapho khona manje sekusepulasini lakhe lalima kulo. Sewucashe  bantfu labasha labane labamsebentelako.
Lipulasi laMatlakane litsengisa labophepha labalu -hlata satjani etimakethe tetibhidvo netitselo eBuchum, Polokwane naseJozi.
Nanoma nje ibhizinisi yakhe imungenisela-R50 000 ngenyanga, Matlakane uphokophele ekutsengiseleni emave emhlaba.
Nanoma nje usengakate watfola lusito kuhulumene, Matlakane ucinisekile ngelikusasa lakhe futsi utsite umgomo wakhe lomkhulu kufukula bantfu labaphuyile emmangweni wakubo ngekutsi abanike emakhono aphindze futsi abacashe, lapho ibhizinisi yakhe ichubeka ikhula.

title: Umshayeli wetikebhe longundzabamlonyeni
author: Allison Cooper
text:
Mdletshe watalwa futsi wakhulela ePort Shepstone wabese ufundza e-St Faiths.
“Mine ngakhula kamna ndzi kakhulu. Ngesikhatsi ngisakhula bekute kwesaba, kungafanani nanamuhla, futsi wonkhe umuntfu beka khuliswa sigodzi sakhe.” Mdletshe waphotfula  matikuletjeni ngemnyaka we-2006, ngembi kwekuya eDurban University of  Techno logy kuyofundzela iNatio nal Diploma  kutifundvo te Maritime Studies  ngemnyaka we-2007.
Emva kwekuphotfula iS1 ngemnyaka we-2007 kanye ne-S2 ngewe-2008 wacala kuceceshwa kwakhe imi nyaka lemitsatfu elwandle, ne-Safmarine Shipping Co mpany. Lapha wafundza ku shayela umkhumbi wemtfwa lo, ahambe ngawo  elwandle lolunemagagasi lamakhulu aye kumagu lahlukahlukene e-Europe, e-Afrika nase-Asia enta imisebenti yemikhu mbi yemitfwalo kanye ne lucwaningo ngetekuphepha.
Watfola ticu takhe tekucala aneminyaka le-25, abe ngale so sikhatsi acedzela ticu ta khe teMaster’s  ku-Port Oper ations . Letifundvo teMaster’s  tamenta waba ngumshayeli wetikebhe loceceshekile.
“Loku kwaba yinseyeya lenkhulu ngoba kuba ngu mshayeli wetikebhe akudzi ngi kutsi ube neticu temfu ndvo tasenyuvesi, kodvwa kudzingeka kuphela ticu teS1 ne-S2 kanye nekuceceshe lwa kuba selwandle. Emva kwaloku, bantfu bavamise kubhalisela kuba bashayeli betikebhe. Ngente kokubili sikhatsi sinye. Uma ngiphu ma emsebentini, bengiya esi kolweni ngiyofundza mse benti wesikolwa lowentiwe ngalelo langa,” washo njalo.
Mdletshe uyakutsandza kuba semantini. “Emanti a ngakutjela lokunengi mayela na nekutsi lilanga lakho li tawuba njani. Lamanye ema langa litawuba ngelelibi ndzile, lamanye libe ngule linebungoti futsi kube  nemagagasi lamakhulu.
Ngalamafisha, lwandle lu yagucugucuka! Imikhu mbi futsi iba nemimo leye hlukahlukene kantsi itfwala imitfwalo lehlukene, leku chaza kutsi kufuneka ilawu lwe ngetindlela letehlukene,” kwasho Mdletshe, lekumtfo kotisa kakhulu kusebenta nelitsimba lelinebantfu la bahlukahlukene labavela emaveni lahlukene.
Umsebenti LonetinseyeyaKuba ngumake kulomkha kha wetelwandle kumatima kwasho Mdletshe, lochaza tintfo letimayelana nebulili njengaletiyinseyeya lenkhulu ngenca yekutsi kusakholelwa kutsi ngumkhakha wema dvodza.
“Nanoma bomake batama kungena basebente nge kutikhandla kute babonise bantfu kutsi bayakhona, ku matima kusebenta elwandle.
Ngikuncobile loku ngekuhlala ngiphansi, nginemoya lokahle wekuphumelela kanye neku sebentisana kute bangi hloniphe. Ngemandla ekube ketela nawebuhlakani, unga tincoba letihibe,” washo njalo.Imphumelelo yaMdletshe yekuncoba letihibe ibonakala kundvondvo layitfola nga lesikhatsi alibamba lempha tsi wetebuciko bemisebenti yaselwandle. “Ngatfola umklo melo wekuba ngulohamba embili ngekuphotfula tifundvo masinyane ngoba umsebenti wami watfola umphumela wekuhlolwa kwemabhuku lote lichashati ngeliviki leku cala lekuba libamba kulesikhu ndla.” Waphindza watfola u mklomelo wekuba yingcwetfu” ngeMphala 2017, ngekuvikela imikhumbi kutivunguvungu letimbi kakhulu letake tabo nwa eDurban.
“Kuba ngumshayeli wetike bhe kusho kutsi lesinye sikhatsi kufanele usebente ngekuti misela futsi ube nesibindzi,” washo njalo.
Kutfola ticu takhe teMaster’s kwenta wonkhe umehluko.
“Kutfola ticu tami kwacinise kisa kuhlonishwa balingani bami lababobabe. Bangibuta onkhe malanga kutsi ngi matasatasa ngani ngoba sibabili kuphela labafundze ngalendlela futsi ngibe weku cala kuphotfula  iMaritime Diploma  Elugwini LaseDurban.  Loku kodvwa kwangeta nga hluka,” watsi, kuchaza ku tsi tifundvo tetelwandle atisi luhlelo lolulula kutifundza.
Umsebenti Wekuba mshayeli WetikebheMdletshe utsi kuba msha yeli wetikebhe kusho kutsi umlawuli wako konkhe lo kwentekako kanye nabo bo nkhe labagibele umkhumbi.
Kufuneka acinisekise kutsi tinsita tekuphepha netekuci sha umlilo tisesimeni lesikahle futsi kunesicinisekiso saloko, ente lucwaningo lwetekuphe pha njalo ngemnyaka, acinise kise kutsi balingani bakhe lasebenta nabo emkhunjini batfola kuceceshwa lokufane le aphindze asayine ema bhuku abo etekuphepha, abuyekete tivumelwano tekusebenta futsi asite tise benti kutsi tibe neluhlelo lwentfutfuko loluhambisana nemisebenti yabo, acinise kise kutsi tinchubomgomo tenkhapani tiyalandzelwa bese ulawula kuphatfwa kwesitoko afake nema-oda etinsita letidzingekako.
Lilanga lelitayelekile la Mdletshe lekusebenta lica la ngeluhlu lwemikhumbi lefikako nalehambako, leku fanele ticedvwe uma kufika sikhatsi sekushayisa. “Sicala ngemisebenti wekuhambisa tintfo ngensimbi ye-06:00 sicedze ngeye-17:50. Ngalo kutayelekile tikebhe letimbili tiyasebentisana, bese kutsi ngasinye sicedze lokungenani imisebenti lesiphohlongo.
Emva kwaloko, kufuneka sicedzise wonkhe umsebenti wemabhuku. Uma kuneti mo letiphutfumako, lesinye sikhatsi sicedza kusebenta ngensimbi ye-21:00,” washo njalo.

title: Kugucula Temfundvo Lephakeme
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Njengoba sive sigubha Inya nga Yelusha, iVuk’uzenzele  ibukisisa indlela lusha lwale live luniketwa ngayo ema tfuba ekuphumelela Litiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha.
Naledi Pandor, Indvuna Yetemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha lebekwe  ngeNdlovana iniketwe u msebenti wekungenisa luhle lo lwemfundvo lephakeme yamahhala kulabo laba phuyile kanye nalabafundzi labavela kumindeni lehola imali lengetulu kwelizinga lelibekiwe kepha labasolo bangakhoni kukhokhela ti ndleko tasenyuvesi.
Emva kwesiteleka lesidze savelonkhe ngaphansi  kwesihloko lesitsi: #Fees MustFall,  kwamenyetelwa ngeNgongoni kutsi lusha loluvela kumindeni lehola imali lengaphansi kwe-R350 000 ngemnyaka lutawu tfola imfundvo yemazinga laphakeme nekuceceshwa yamahhala. Kuphake lwa kwalemfundvo kusachubeka fu tsi kutawutsatsa sikhatsi lesinge tulu kwemi nyaka lesihla nu.Luhlelo lwemfundzateIndvuna Pandor icinisekise kutsi kungeniswa kweluhlelo lwemfundzate kuchubeka kahle.
“Loluhlelo lolusha lwemfu ndzate likungenelela loku mcoka kwahulumende wase Ningizimu Afrika, ngoba, ecinisweni, bantfu baseNingi zimu Afrika imali yabo yentse la lekhokhela lemifundzate,” washo njalo.
Loluhlelo lwemfundzate luni ketwa labo bafundzi labacala kungena emanyuvesi kanye nasemakolishi Etifundvo Te buciko Bemisebenti Yetandla kanye Nekuceceshwa (emaTVET), kuyo yonkhe iminyaka yekufundza.
Lomfundzate wesekelwe nge mali leyengetiwe yahulume nde letigidzigidzi leti-R7.166 ngemnyaka we-2018 – kwatsi tigidzigidzi le-R4.581 tabeke lwa bafundzi labaphumelele kungena emanyuvesi kwatsi tigidzigidzi le-R2.585 tabeke lwa bafundzi bemakolishi e-TVET.
Indvuna Pandor yatsi ema kolishi labukene nemikhakha letsite yetemfundvo angahle abe tikhungo tebuchwephesha letikhicita emakhono lancono kulowo mkhakha wesifundvo.
Sibonelo, likolishi lelilodvwa lingabukana kuphela nemse benti webunjiniyela betinjini bese kutsi lelinye libukane nebunjiniyela kutetindiza, wa chaza njalo. Wangeta ngekutsi “ngiyatsemba kutsi kuvumela kutsi likolishi libukane kuphela netifundvo letitsite letimba lwa kulikusasa lemakolishi.
“Sifuna emakolishi etfu ente tifundzo letahlukahlukene.
Asifuni kutsi onkhe ente intfo lefanako.”Kusesenjalo luhlelo Lwemfu ndvo Lephakeme Lwekutfu tfukisa Bosomabhizinisi lasu ngulwa lomnyaka lophelile kute kugcugcutelwe bantfu la basha bacale amabhizinisi abo.
Luhlose kuchumanisa  inkhundla yekutfutfukisa temabhizinisi kulomkhakha wetemfundvo weNingizimu Afrika. Loku kufaka ekhatsi kuba sifundziswa kutema bhizinisi, kutfutfukisa bafundzi kutemabhizinisi kanye nema nyuvesi etemabhizinisi.
Indvuna Pandor yatsi kune ngi lokufuneka kwenteke kute kungasitakali kuphela bantfu labasha kutsi balungele ku sebenta, kodvwa kutsi bona bavule ematfuba emisebenti lesezingeni lelikahle.
Unesifiso sekubona tikhungo temfundvo lephakeme titfula temabhizinisi kuwo onkhe emakhozi, lekusinyatselo lesi tawenta labo labaklonyelisiwe ngetimendlela temfundvo bacale emabhizinisi lama ncane latawugucula likusasa  lalelive.

title: Ummango ugubha umkhosi wesivumelwano sekubuyiselwa umhlaba setigidzigidzi letinge-R21
author: Siya Miti
text:
Lommango waseDouble Drift dvutane naseGrahamstown uhlala bantfu labalinganiselwa ku-1 500 labavela emindenini le-264. Basuswa emhlabatsini wabo nguhulumende waseCiskei nga-1991, ngalesikhatsi bavulela kutsi kwakhiwe sichiwu seti nyamatane semuntfu lomhlo phe.
Lommango usandza kutfola tincwadzi tebuniyo talomhlaba, lewabuyiselwa kubo ngekwa loluhlelo lekwabiwa kabusha kwemhlaba.  Ngekusho kwaNdvunankhulu waseMphumalanga Koloni Phumulo Masualle, imali etigidzi letinge-R21 seyibeke lwe kutsi kutsengwe lomhlaba kantsi utawubuyiselwa kuba nikati ngekwetigaba.
“Lesi sinyatselo lesibaluleke kakhulu ngalokuphatselene netekulondvolota kanye neti ngucuko. Lesichiwu siyatfutfu kiswa kutsi sikwati kuncinti sana kahle naletinye tichiwu tetilwane tasendle kantsi hulumende usekela lommango ngekubaniketa imali, tilwane tasendle nelucecesho," kusho Masualle.  Lommango, lebalawula nawo lesichiwu ngekusebentisana ne-Eastern Cape Parks and Tourism Agency (i-ECPTA) ngapha nsi kweLikhayalethu Com munal Property Association (i-LCPA), batfole imali letigidzi le-R6 levela kuLitiko Letemvelo kutsi basungule umkhakha wekukhulisa umnotfo ngetasendle kulesichiwu lesinemahekta la 1 400 lebatsengelwe sona Litiko Lekutfutfukiswa Kwetindzawo Tasemaphandleni Netingucuku Kutemhlaba. Sihlalo we-LCPA, Mxolisi Ngesi, utsite lommango wenta sicelo sekubuyiselwa umhlaba nga-1998. Nga-2012 emalunga emmango aniketwa umhlaba longemahekta lange-23 500 lenyalo kubese kungetelwa ngalena lefakiwe lengemahekta la-1 400 kulesichiwu.
“Sijabule kakhulu ngoba sesikutfole konkhe lesikudzi ngako. Hulumende usinikete lusito ngetimali kwentela tinsitanchanti. Sinetilwane tasendle, lesifaka ekhatsi emadvube lali-10, 15 wetingongoni ne-10 leti mphofu,” kusho Ngesi, kungeta kuloko kutawube kunetinyatsi netimpala njengalokudzinge kako.
Ungete kwekutsi lommango bewuceceshwa baka-ECPTA kutsi basebentise lesichiwu.
“Loluhlelo kutsi kwakhiwe tindzawo tekulala tivakashi letimbili (ma-lodge) kantsi kwa nyalo sakha indzawo yekulala tisebenti tasesichiwini kanye nesibaya lapho kwehliswa khona letilwane," kusho Ngesi.
“Ngalesikhatsi kufakwa lofenisi longemakhilomitha la-10 neligede lekungena, kwakhi wa ematfuba emsebenti kuba ntfu bemmango labange-61," kusho Ndvuna Wetemvelo Ednah Molewa ngalesikhatsi baniketwa lesichiwu ngaloku semtsetfweni.

title: Kwakha ematfuba emsebenti elusha lwase-KZN
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
Bantfu labasha labange-25 KwaZulu-Natal sebavele baceceshiwe batfola nemse benti nakuvulwa lenkha-pani lensha yeMahindra.
Letisebenti ticeceshwe ngekubambisana nebakaMahindra kanye ne-AIH Logistics kantsi bata wutfunyelwa e-India kutsi bachubeke nekuceceshwa lapho kudzingeke khona.
Lokukhicitwa lekuta wube kulingwa ngako  kulendzawo sekutawusu ngulwa ngekutsi kukhici twe timoto letitawulingani selwa ku-2 000 ngemnyaka. Ekugcineni kutawukhicitwa timoto letingalinganiselwa ku-4 000 njalo ngemnyaka.
"Lokusisa kuhle ekuletseni litsemba kumabhizinisi. kuyachubeka nekukhombi sa kwekutsi lendzawo ya KwaZulu-Natal yindzawo lekahle yekusisa. Lokhu kubuya kutfumele umla yeto kulabo lebasanga bata kwekutsi iDurban yindzawo longayicabanga uma ufuna kusisa," kusho Umphatsiswatiko Wekutfutfukiswa Kwemnotfo, Tekuvakasha Netemvelo Sihle Zikalala ngalesikhatsi kuvulwa lendzawo.
Utsite lamatfuba emsebenti ekucala lasungulwe kulendzawo atawufaka sandla ekukhuliseni ema khono lakhona kulesi fundza.
Munye waletisebenti lone ticu tebunjiniyela Sthembiso Mthembu utsite uyajabula kakhulu kutsi atfole umsebenti.
"Besolo ngihleli ekhaya umnyaka wonkhe nginga wutfoli umsebenti. Lelitfu ba lingisitile kutsi ngikhone kunelisa tidzingo tami nemndeni wami. Noma ngineticu tebunjiniyela bemakhenikhali kodvwa bengingakwati lokunyenti ngekuhlanganisa imoto. Lokuceceshwa lesikutfolile kusisitile kutsi sibe nelwati lolujulile," asho ananatela.  Sikhulu Lesiphetse  Temisebenti Mhlabawonkhe sakaMahindra Arvind Ma tthew utsi lenkhapani ihlose kutsenga ma-40% waletinye tetintfo talamaveni ema-Pik Up kutitolo takuleli.
"Lokwakhiwa kwale Pik Up sinyatselo sekucala kuloluhlelo lwetfu lwesikhatsi lesidze lolutasenta senyuse ematfuba emisebenti futsi setsenge imikhicito yetitolo talesifundza saKwaZu lu-Natal," kusho yena .

title: Bosotimboni bemakhemikhali labamnyama baseFreyistata bakha ematfuba emsebenti
author: More Matshediso
text:
IKevali Chemicals yinkhapani yekucala lephetfwe ba ntfu labamnyama kulendzawo  yaseFreyistata lekhicita imihlo bo lehlukene yemakhemikhali ekucwenga emanti, ekuhlobisa endlini nekuhlanta imithoyi kanye nekwekunamatselisa.
Lenkhapani yasungulwa nga-2014 bangani labasihlanu labanelwati ngemakhemikhali, timphahla letitsengiseka masi nyane, kutfutfukiswa kwe mikhicito, kanye netinhlobo letahlukene teglu yekunama tselisa.  Umcondzisi Lomkhulu weKevali Chemicals Funeka Khumalo utsi i-BIS yasekela inkhapani yakhe kutsi itfole imishini nemathulusi kute icale kukhicita nekusungula umkhi cito wekucwenga emanti, weku hlobisa nekubulala emagci wane kanye netinhlobonhlobo teglu yekunamatselisa.
 “Uma sicala kwafanele kwekutsi sifake imali kute lebhizi nisi icale kusebenta kodvwa sabese sesitfola kusekelwa ngetimali beLitiko Letekuhwe belana Netimboni (i-dti) ngekusebentisa i-BIS kanye neNhlangano Yekutfutfukisa Timboni (i-IDC)," asho anaba.
I-BIS iluhlelo lwesibonelelo Salenchubomgomo Yaboso timboni Labamnyama lehlose kuvula ematfuba lakhona kubosotimboni labamnyama  eNinizimu Afrika ngekusebe ntisa indlela yekungenelela noma njani ngetimali nanga lokunye lokungadzingi imali, ngendlela lehlosiwe futsi lecha zwe kahle.  Khumalo utsi kwabatsatsa imali lelinganiselwa kutigidzi le-R18 kutsi lebhizinisi ikhone kucala kusebenta netinyanga letilinganiselwa ku-11 kutsi bacale kwenta inzuzo.
Lenkhapani isabalalisa imikhicito yayo kuyo yonkhe iNingi zimu Afrika kanye nase-Uga-nda, Namibia, naseTanzania.
Khumalo utse lomtselela lenkhapani lebe nawo etimphi lweni tebantfu bendzawo mkhulu kunekwakha ematfuba emsebenti.
“Kuko konkhe nalokungetulu kwekwakha ematfuba emsebe nti kubantfu bendzawo, sinelu hlelo lwekusisa emmangweni lapho sisita khona bomake basemadolobheni nasemakhaya kutsi batisungulele emabhi zinisi lasemancane lasebe-nta ngekukhicita imikhicito yekuhlobisa nekucoceka emakhaya," asho alandzisa. Utsite bosomabhizinisi labasebancane kufanele bati kwekutsi kusungula ibhizinisi akukaze kube lula kodvwa akukafaneli balahlekelwe litsemba ngoba ekugcineni batatijabulela titselo talo.
Sekelandvuna Wetimboni Nekuhwebelana Bulelani Magwanishe utse iKevali iyahlonishwa ngalokutsi ibe yinkhapani yekucala lesebenta ngemikhicito yemakhemikhali, yemitsi kanye nemaplastiki nekwekutsi iniketwe imvume kusukela kwasungulwa Luhlelo Lwabosotimboni Labamnya ma nga-2016.  Sekelandvuna Magwanishe utsi, “Lenkhapani itawetfula tinsita nematfuba emsebenti lebesolo kukudzala adzingeka kulemimango lesondzelene nayo letfolakala eHarrismith lapho beyikhungetfwe ngemazinga laphakeme ekuswe lakala kwemsebenti".

title: I-NHI seyifike kutekunakekelwa ngetemphilo letincono
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Motsoaledi bekakhuluma emhlanganweni webetindza ba losandza kubanjwa lapho beketfula khona Umtsetfo sivivinyo wekuChitjelwa kwetindzaba te-NHI kanye neMtsetfosivivinyo wekuChi bela tindzaba teTikimu teTe kwelashwa.LeMitsetfosivivinyo ivula indlela yekutsi babe banengi bantfu labatfola tinsita tete mphilo ngekusebentisa i-NHI.
Umtsetfosivivinyo luhlaka lwemtsetfo. Imitsetfosivivi nyo leminyeti yentiwa litiko lahulumende ngekucondzi swa yindvuna lefanele. LoMtse tfosivivinyo ufanele kutsi ubese uvunywa yiKhabhine thi ngembi kwekutsi wetfulwe ePhalamende.
Lokwetfulwa kwaleMitse tfosivivinyo lemibili kusho kutsi iNigizimu Afrika seyi dvute ngesinyatselo sinye ekutsini itfole tekunakekelwa kwebantfu ngelizinga lelihle letemphilo ngalokufananako lokusho kutsi-ke masinyane nje i-NHI itawuba ngumtse tfo.
I-NHI iyinchubo yekusita ngetimali letawenta sicinise ko sekutsi tonkhe takhamuti taseNingizimu Afrika titfola tinsita tetemphilo letibalule kile, ngekungakhatsali ngeti mo tabo temsebenti kanye ne kutsi bayakhona yini kufaka imali ngco kulesikhwama.
Motsoaledi utsite hulu mende uyati kutsi kukhona bantfu labakholelwa eku tsini kungakacalwa nje kutsi kukhulunywe nge-NHI, ku nesidzingo sekutsi kucalwe ngekulungisa simo setinsita tetemphilo letintengantenga ko saseNigizimu Afrika.
Utsite hulumende uyatati letinkinga telizinga lelibi ne kweswelakala kwemakhono kutekunakekelwa ngetemphi lo tahulumende.
Mtsoaledi utsite Luhlelo  Lwekutfutfukisa Lwavelonkhe  (i-NDP) yakucaphela loku  nekutsi futsi ekufezekiswe ni kwale-NHI, kudzingeka kutsi kulungiswe lelizinga le libi letinsita tetemphilo kanye netindleko tetinsita tete mphilo letibitwa tikhungo tete mphilo letitimele.
Ngesikhatsi kusasebanjwe tinkhulumomphikiswano  mayelana netichibelo tale Mitsetfosivivinyo, lelitiko lita wufezekisa lokungenani imi klamo lemine ye-NHI, lefa ka ekhatsi tinsita tetemphilo etikolweni, tinsita tetemphi lo talabagula ngengcondvo, tinsita tetemphilo tabomake labakhulelwe labanebumati ma nekukhulelwa kwabo eti bhedlela letinge-22 letitsintse ke kakhulu kanye newesi fo semdlavuta (i-oncology), ngekusita kakhulu iGau teng neKwaZulu-Natal, ko dvwa-ke kube kungabekwa eceleni letinye tifundza.
Motsoaledi uphindze watsi tindleko letibitwa tikhungo temphilo letitimele atifinyele lwa takhamuti taseNingizimu Afrika letinyenti. Sekubekwe loyo bekakadze aLijaji leLikhu lu Sandile Ngcobo yiKho mishini yeTekuncintisana ku tsi ente lucwaningo ngetindle ko tetinsita tetemphilo leti bitwa tikhungo tetemphilo letitimele.
“Letichibelo lesitetfula ko tentelwe kuletsa lusito lolu dzingeka kakhulu kutigu lane letititfola tikuletinkhulu tinkinga tekubabete imali,” kwasho yena.
Motsoaledi utsite sichibe lo sekucala saloMtsetfosivi vinyo sitawucedza kukhokha ngekuhlanganyela noma-ke kutsi kube khona imali nawe loyikhiphako ekhikhini lakho.
Kukhokha ngekubambisana kusho kutsi sikimu sikhokha incenye yenkhokhelo yema li sibhedlela noma dokotela lotimele layikhokhisa sigu lane. Lena lesele-ke imali ibese ifanela kutsi ikhokhwe ngulesigulane ngeyaso imali lephuma ikhikhini laso.

title: Uma Imphilo Ikunika Emalamula, Walime
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Eminyakeni lelishumi le yendlulile, ngesikhatsi  angusomabhizinisi lone minyaka lenge-23 budzala, Mansfield wala litfuba leku sebenta epulazini lebeka cupha kulo emalamula bese uyawatsengisa. Kwengeta ekutsini bekasesemncane futsi ete nenkhabunkhabu yekulima.
Nanoma kunjalo, emi nyakeni letsite ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi, wantjintja u mcondvo wakhe ngesikhatsi abona kukhula lizinga leku funwa kwemalamula.
“Ngaphindze ngacaphela kutsi balimi nabo bebenta loku bekwentiwa ngitsi tsi ne bositolosiyandzindza – bebatipakishela imikhicito yabo bese bayoyitsengisa emakethe eKapa. Ngabese ngiyacaphela kutsi kunge nteka kutsi masinyane nje angeke sibe nebantfu la banyenti lesitawubatse ngisela tsine bositolosi yandzindza," kwasho yena.
Kutsite nga-2013, umlimi wendzawo wavuma kucece -sha Mansfield waphindze wamrentisela umhla ba longemahektha la-12.
Waphindze futsi wamfakela emaphayiphi ekunisela lo kwenta kutsi Mansfield akho ne kulima.
Nga-2015, wakhona kutse ngisa emalamula lange mathani lange-31 ngapha ndle kweminyele yale li laseNingizimu Afrika kwaphindze futsi kwatsi nga-2016, lelinani lakhula kakhulu laba ngemathani la-168.
Loku kwenteke ngenca yelusito lolwatfolwa kuLu hlelo Lwekusita neKutfu tfukisa Balimi lokungu lo lolwenta kutsi nga-2015 atfole sibonelelo kuLuhle lo Lolukhulu Lwekusitwa Ngetekulima (i-CASP). Loku kwa menta  wantinta  wabuye fu tsi waba ngumlimi londlo ndlobele.
Kuhlomisa abalimi ngemakhono ebalimiLoLuhlelo Lwekusita neKutfutfukisa Balimi luhlose kwakha emakhono emima ngo nebantfu labebakadze bancisheke ematfuba phambi lini, ikakhulu labo labazuze eKuhlelweni Kabusha Kwe mhlaba. Lusita balimi labasakhasa, labalimela kutidlela bese batsengisa loko lokusa lako, balimi labanemhlabatsi lomncane kanye nebalimi labakhulu labalimela kutsengisa etimakethe letinkhulu.
Umlawuli wemklamo weluphiko lolubukene nekutfutfukisa tekulima Shaheed Martin kuLitiko Letekulima laseNshonalanga Kapa utsite loluhlelo selusite balimi basimama.
“Sisita balimi kusukela ekucaleni noma-ke esinyatse lweni sekucala. Loku kusho kutsi sibasita ngenchubo yekufaka sicelo sekutfola lusito lwemali futsi titsi tingavunywa leticelo, sibese-ke sibasita ngekufezekisa nekukhicita," kwasho yena.
Uchaze watsi lelitiko libukana naloludzaba ngendlela lebanti lefaka ekhatsi konkhe lokufanele libuye futsi libanike tinsitakalo tekulima letiphelele, kufaka ekhatsi kusita ngesakhiwonchanti.
“Sinebahlatiyi betemnotfo noma-ke bosomnotfo futsi nabo ngalokunjalo batawenta kutsi balimi bakwati kufinyelela timakethe uma sebasi meme.” kwasho yena.

title: Kusutsa kuhambisana nekutfola imiphumela lemihle
author: More Matshediso
text:
laseNingizimu Afrika laba- setikolweni tahulumende sebayakhona kwenta umse- benti wabo kancono, sibo- nga loluhlelo lwahulumende lolucinisekisa kwekutsi tisu tabo tihlale tisemfi ngekudla lokunemsoco.
Litiko Letemfundvo Lesise-
kelo (i-DBE), ngekusebentisa Luhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwe- tikolo Lwekondla (i-NSNP), liyengcile injongo yalo yekunika kudla bantfwana bakuleli labalinganiselwa kumaphesenti lange-75.
lweni onkhe malanga ba- ntfwana labalinganiselwa eti-9 032 622 velonkhe.
Utsite tikolo letingasiyo ince- nye yaloluhlelo kufanele kutsi tivakashele emahhovisi asesigodzini sabo uma ngabe tifuna kuba yincenye yalo. N gemnyakatimali	wa- nga-2015/16, tigidzi letili- nganiselwa ku-R5 703 tafa- kwa kuloluhlelo.
Rakwena  utsite  lemali 
lecitfwe kuloluhlelo iyachi- tjiyelwa njalo ngemnyaka kute ihambisane nekunyuka kwetintfo, kantsi ibhajethi yanga-2017/18 ilinganiselwa kutigidzi leti-R6.4.
Loluhlelo lucedza kulamba kwesikhashana kantsi futsi lufaka sandla kunhlalakahle yebantfwana.
“Bantfwana labanyenti ba- vela emakhaya lahluphekile langakhoni kuba nekudla labangakudla, kantsi ku-
labanye bafundzi, lokudla
labakudla esikolweni ngiko kudla labakudlela lilanga lonkhe. Kudla labakudla esi- kolweni kuyabasita kutsi bakhone kufundza, kulale- lisisa nekutimbandzakanya eklasini,” washo njalo.
Emanani ebafundzi lababha- lisako etikolweni nalabange- na sikolo anyukile ngenca yaloluhlelo lwekutfola kudla esikolweni.
Kungasikudzala, iKhabhi- nethi ivume kushicilelwa kwe Mbiko Wekulingani- swakwe-NSNP lobhalwe Litiko Letekuhlela, Kuca- phela kanye Nekulungisa (i-DPME). Uchaza imphume- lelo netinyatselo letingatsa- tfwa kuphumelelisa lemita- mo.
Umcondzisi Wekulinganisa
ka-DPME, Jabu Mathe, utsite injongo lenkhulu yekuli- nganisa kwekutsi kuhlolwe kutsi ngabe i-NSNP yenti- wa ngalendlela letawuba nemiphumela lekhombisa umehluko lomkhulu kutem- philo kantsi kube nenzuzo emfundvweni yebafundzi. Uphindze wagcizelela kwe- kutsi injongo yaloluhlelo seyiphelele kwekutsi kwenti- we kancono temphilo nesimo sekudla kahle kwebafundzi labaphuye kakhulu eNingi- zimu Afrika. Loluhlelo lu- hlose kufinyelela kubo bonkhe  bantfwana  laba-
setikolweni tahulumende
letisemkhakheni welizi- nga lebuphuya 1 kuya ku-3, letilinganiselwa kumaphe- senti la-60 etikolweni leti- phuye kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.
Loluhlelo luphindze futsi lusite ngekwehlisa buphuya emimangweni ngekwakha ematfuba emsebenti.
“ Lokulinganisa kutfole kwekutsi i-NSNP inika ematfuba kulabatinikele kusebenta ngalokudla la- bangetulu kweti-50 000 njalo ngemnyaka lekufanele kutsi baphekele bantfwana, kantsi batfola imali yekubabonga lenge-R960 njalo ngenya- nga,” kusho Mathe.
“Loku kusho kutsi tigidzi
letinge-R576 ngemnyaka ti- yiswa kumholo wekubabo- nga kute kuzuze emalunga emmango.”
Loluhlelo lukhutsata ku- tsi kubekhona lokwentiwa kutemnotfo njengoba boso- mabhizinisi labasebancane, labasemkhatsini nalese- bakhulile kanye netinhjlanga- no letisebenta ngekuhlanga- nyela tiyazuza njengebantfu labatfula tinsita kuleto ti- fundza ngekutsi umsebe- nti uniketwe ngekulingana (KaZulu-Natal, eGauteng, eMpumalanga naseNyaka- tfo Kapa).
Kutsenga  tibhidvo  ku-
leyo ndzawo kunemtselela
wekuniketa inzuzo etiko-
lweni nas em m angweni kubuye kukhulise tekulima etigodzini tasemakhaya.
Lombiko ubuye futsi wave- ta kwekutsi tifundza, i- Nshonalanga Koloni, iMpu- malanga, iMphumalanga Koloni, iNyakatfo Koloni neNyakatfo Nshonalanga ti- lwente kahle kakhulu lolu- hlelo kuleminyaka lendluli- le.

title: Imisebenti Yesikhungo Sekunika Lusito Ngeticelo Letifakiwe Yanga-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Sikhungo Sekunika Lusito Ngeticelo Letifakiwe (i-CACH) luhlelo lwesikhashana lolacalwa Litiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha kusita titjudeni letifuna kungena Eluhlelweni Lwetikolo Temfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha ngemuva kwamatekuletjeni (i-PSET) kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi tingahle tibukane nesimo lapho khona:

Bafake sicelo ngesikhatsi esikhungweni labasitsandzako kodvwa sicelo sabo sangamukeleki kantsi nyalo sikhatsi sesihambile kutsi bangafaka lesinye sicelo kulenye indzawo.
Bafundzi labangemukelwa bangakafaki sicelo ngoba bangenako loko lokudzingekako kute bafake sicelo sekufundza ngenca yemiphumela yabo lengemihle yeLibanga le-11 kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi imiphumela yabo yeLibanga le-12 iyabavumela kwekutsi bangangena.
Abakafaki sicelo kusenesikhatsi ngenca yesizatfu lesitsite noma lesinye noma abakafaki sicelo nje sanhlobo.
Abati kwekutsi bafuna kufundzela ini nabacedza matekuletjeni.
Bayati kutsi bafuna kufundzela ini kodvwa abanasiciniseko sekutsi loku labakhetse kukufundzela kungumsebenti lolungile yini.

Tinsita letiniketwa yi-CACH
Ticelo tematfuba ekufundza leticondziswe ku-PSET (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi eTheknoloji, ematheknikhali nemakolishi ekufundzela umsebenti neMkhakha Wetemfundvo neMitimba Yekucecesha.
Lwatiso netinsita ngetimali (lwatiso nge- NSFAS).
Tinsita tekutfutfukiswa kwetemisebenti (kwelulekwa, lwatiso, kwecwayiswa nekuhlelela umsebenti/lwatiso ngekusekelwa ngetimali kanye netindlela tekusitwa ngetimali).
Kusekelwa kwemaciko lasebenta ngetandla (Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekusekelwa Kwentfutfuko Yemaciko Lasebenta Ngetandla).
Loluhlelo lwe-CACH lucala ngamhla ti-3 Bhimbidvwane 2018, masinyane ngembi kwekukhishwa kwemiphumela yeluhlolo lwe-NSC, kantsi lutawusebenta kudzimate kuphele inyanga yeNdlovana nga-2018.

Isebenta njani i-CACH?
Sigaba seku-1: Titjudeni letingakatsatfwa ndzawo kulesinye setikhungo labafake sicelo kuto, noma letifuna ematfuba ekufundza e-PSET, tingatsintsana ne-CACH ngekusebentisa iNombolo yaMahhala: 0800 356 635, iwebhusayithi:
www.dhet.gov.za noma ngekutfumela ligama lakho neNombolo Yematisi nge-SMS ku: 49200 noma bangabhalisa ku-inthanethi.
Ungabuye utfole kabanti ngekuvakashela likhasi labo le-Facebook lelitsi: CACH_SA.

Sigaba sesi-2: Ema-Ejenti atawushayela lomfundzi lofake sicelo mahhala, batamshayela kulesikhungo sekutsintsana bese babhalisa yonkhe imininingwane ledzingekako eluhlweni lwedatha ye-CACH, kufaka ekhatsi loku umfundzi langatsandza kukufundzela kanye nesifundza langatsandza kufundzela kuso.

Sigaba sesi-3: Imininingwane yonkhe yalona lofake sicelo kanye nemiphumela yamatekuletjeni itawucinisekiswa ibuye idluliselwe kuleso sikhungo semfundvo lephakeme kwentelwe kutfolelwa
sikhala nekungeniswa kuleso sikolo uma kuphumeleleka.

Sigaba sesi-4: Luhlelo lwe-CACH lutawucinisekisa lolwatiso lwemfundzi bese balutfumela etikhungweni letisolo tinetikhala letivulekile. Lapho kusolo kunetikhala khona kantsi bafundzi banako loku lokudzingekako, tikhungo titawushayela labo labafake ticelo ngco.

Lekufanele ukwati
I-CACH angeke yacinisekisa noma bani lofake sicelo kutsi utasitfola sikhala sekufundza.
I-CACH angeke yati kwekutsi lesikhungo sitamphendvula nini lona lofake sicelo kute bamtfolele indzawo.

I-CACH ibasita njani labafake ticelo labangenasiciniseko sekutsi bafundzele ini noma labo labangenako loko lokudzingekako kutsi bangene eLuhlelweni lwe- PSET?
Luhlelo lwe-CACH lusebentisana neTinsita Tekutfutfukisa Emakhono Velonkhe (i-CDS) lesita ekuniketeni lwatiso lolufaka ekhatsi yonkhe intfo ngetemisebenti nekululekwa nge:

Lwatiso ngekubhala luhlolo lwekuchibiyela.
kubhalela kutfola imiphumela lencono yamatekuletjeni.
Ematfuba ekufundza laniketwa beluhlelo lwe-PSET.
Tindlela tekuniketwa kwetimali nelusito ngetimali tekufundza.
Lwatiso lolumayelana netinchubo tekufaka ticelo netinsuku tekuvalwa.
Ticelo letifakwa ngesigamu sesibili netinsuku tekubhalisa.

title: Yolisa uphotsa indlela yakhe leya emphumelelweni
author: Dale Hes
text:
kela ekuphileni imphilo yebuphuya eMphuma - langa Kapa, kuya lapho afinyelela kutfola kho- na lutsandvo lolukhu- lu lwebuc iko nem s e- benti wetandla kantsi nya- lo ubamba imihlangano- sikolwa lapho ashiyelana khona ngemakhono akhe nalabanye bomake labanga- sebenti.
Fuma watalelwa elokishini
ngephandle eQueenstown eMphumalanga Kapa, lapho bebahlala endlini lencane nemalunga la-15 emndeni wakhe.
“Batali bami bebete imali leyanele yekungitfumela esi- kolweni. Njengaloku bengi- ngakafundzi, kwadzingeka kutsi ngizame yami indlela yekwenta imali,” kwasho yena njalo Fuma.
Wacitsa ema-awa lamanyenti afundza kukhrosheta wase uya eKapa wayowuhlala na- dzadzewabo. Fuma wase-ke utifundzisa kwenta umsebe- nti webuhlalu lobuphotsiwe, wase uya eMbekweni ePaarl wayofuna khona emadlelo laluhlata.
“Bebabanyenti bantfu labe-
bafuna umsebenti webuhlalu lobuphotsiwe. Ngaleyo ndle- la-ke ngase ngibuka imikhici- to lembalwa yebuhlalu ngase ngicala ngiyayehlukanisa kahle ngayinye ngayinye kute ngitfole kahle kutsi yentiwe njani. Ngase-ke ngiyatifu- ndzisa kutsi ngente yami imi- khicito ngase ngicala kuyi- tsengisa lapha eSikhungweni saseKhwezi ePaarl,” kwasho yena.
Fuma bekangulomunye
webakhiciti bemsebenti weta- ndla labasafufusa labange-20 labakhetfwe nguMasipala waseKhaya iDrankenstein kanye neNhlangano yeteku- Vakasha  yaseDrakenstein
(i-DLTA), kutsi ahambele luhlelo lwetinsuku letine lwekuceceshwa lebeluhlelwe yi-Craft and Design Institute (i-CDI).
Loluhlelo lufundzise labo labalungenele kutsi bakhi- cite imikhicito lesibonelo semikhicito letsandzwa batsengi letawubasita kutsi basungule emabhizinisi abo. “Lomhlanganosikolwa usifundzise kutsi singabhala njani emapulani emabhizinisi etfu. Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngalelitfuba lenginikwe lona, ngobe ngitawukhona kuchu- ba ibhizinisi yami,” kuchaza yena njalo Fuma.
Imikhicito yakhe yebuhlalu
lobuphotsiwe nalakukhro- shetile nyalo sekutsengwa batsengi ngisho baseGerma- ny nabaseSweden.
“Ngaletinye tikhatsi be- kumatima, kodvwa ngenca yekusekelwa baka-CDI namasipala, sengicalile kwe- nta imadlana lengisita kutsi ngondle bantfwabami labane. Emaphupho ami lamanyenti asayafezeka nyalo,” kwasho yena Fuma njalo.
Yolisa wancuma kutsi ufuna kwendlulisela lwati lwakhe kanye nemakhono akhe kubomake bendzawo labangasebenti, kute kutsi nabo bacale bente imali labayidzingako yekondla imindeni yabo.
“Kwanyalo ngibamba imihlanganosikolwa kanye nekuceceshela endlini yami nalabanye bomake labatsatfu labangasebenti. Nginelitse- mba lekutsi khona madvute nje ngitawubacasha kulebhi- zinisi yami,” kwasho yena Fuma.

title: Lutsandzo lwekuhlanyela tibhidvo lwamholela ebhizinisini lephumelelako
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
ejalidini lakhe bekangaca- bangi kutsi ngalelinye lilanga utawuba ngumnikati webhi- zinisi yekulima lephakela ti- tolo tendzawo kanye netikolo lapho bantfwana badla khona. Ng aleka (loneminyaka yebudzala lenge-67) udzabuka KwaXolo ePort Shepstone, Kwa- Zulu-Natal.
Uhlanyela sipinashi, emakha-
bishi, ticadze, ematamatisi, ema-anyanisi, emabhontjisi nabhanana. Ibhizinisi yakhe izuze umklomelo wekuba ngu- mkhiciti lophuma embili nga- 2016 ngesikhatsi semiklomelo yabosomabhizinisi labasikati, i-Female Entreprenuers Awards, yeLitiko letekuLima laKwaZu- lu-Natal.
Ngaleka utsite manje ngesikhat-
si acala ahlanyela tibhidvo, bekafuna kusita umndeni wakhe kutsi utfole kudla lokusandza kuvunwa kodvwa lutsandvo lwakhe lolukhulu lwamholela kulebhizinisi yakhe. Uphindze
futsi wacasha bomake lababili kutsi basebente kulelipulazi lakhe.
“Kwanyalo ngisahlanyela umkhicito wami emhla- beni lomahektha lamabili kodvwa awukaneli. Bantfu bafuna tibhidvo tami ngobe angibasebentisi bomanyolo bemakhemikhali ngisebe- ntisa umcuba lengiwutsatsa esibayeni setinkhomo,” kwasho yena.
Ngaleka use waba nguthishela
ngaphambilini bekanelutsandvo lolukhulu lwekulima ngesikha- tsi asasebenta njengathishela lapha esikolweni salabancane eGcilima Primary.
“Bengitsi nangiphuma esi- kolweni ngiye emasimini. Benginenshisekelo lenkhulu yekudla kudla lokunemphilo. Ngesikhatsi ngifinyelela emnya- keni wekutsatsa umhlalaphasi lebengikufuna nje kutsi ngibe ngumlimi ngesikhatsi sami le- siseceleni.
“Ngacala ngesipinashi, ikhabi-
shi nebhithiruthi ngakutsengisa emtfolamphilo wendzawo.
Onkhe malanga bengi- buyela emuva ekhaya bangi-
ts engele s onkhe s ito ko sami. Loko kwangikhu- tsata kutsi ngihlanyele kakhulu,” kwasho yena njalo.
Ngaleka uchaza kutsi kulima tibhidvo kunetinsayeya kwato noko.
“Tibhidvo balimi labanyenti abatijabuleli kutihlanyela ngobe tidzinga simo selitulu lesihle. Akukafuni kutsi kubandze kakhulu nome kushise kakhulu,” kwasho yena.
Ngaleyo nzuzo Ngaleka layi- tfola kulebhizinisi yakhe yekuli- ma sewukhone kuphindza futsi atsenge emahektha emhlaba la- matsatfu langetiwe lapho atawu- hlanyela khona tihlahla telitiya. “Ngiphindze futsi ngatfola titolo lapho ngitawubaphakela khona ngaletihlahla telitiya. Tihlahla telitiya tikhipha woyela lokhetsekile lowelapha inkinga yesikhumba lefanana nekucu- buka.”
Ngaleka wagcugcutela bomake
kutsi sebalinge kuba balimi ikakhulu ngobe kunetinzuzo letinyenti.
“Ungalima ejalidini lakho bese uyakwandzisa. Lomhlaba ugcwele ematfuba abomake.”

title: Kudlala ngemagagasi kususa bantfwana emgwaceni
author: Vuyo Ndlovu
text:
I-Surfers Not Street Chi ldren yinhlangano lebo nelela kuphakelwa kweti fundvo tekuntjweza tama hhala ebantfwaneni labahla la emigwaceni nelusha le libondzinga sitsebeni leli tfolakala emkhatsini kwale lidolobhakati.  Lenhlangano ibukene ngco nekulwa nekuswelakala kwemakhaya ebantfwaneni futsi icinisekisa kutsi lusha lwenta lokutsite lokwakha ko ngetimphilo talo.
Masipala waseThekwini madvute nje ucedza kwese kela lenhlangano ngekuni -kela ngemabhodi eku ntjweza lali-10.
Lamabhodi entelwe ku tsi asebente kutfutfukisa tekuntjweza futsi entiwe ngeligwebu lelenta ku tsi labo labasafundza ku ntjweza bandande emantini bangangcwili.
Umphatsi walomasipa la welitiko lekutfutfukisa temidlalo nekukhibika Te ddi Adams watsi lamabhodi atawusita labo labanesifiso sekuntjweza.
“Lomnikelo uyincenye yendlelamasu yamasipa la yekutfutfukisa temi dlalo nekucinisekisa ku tsi lonkhe lusha, ngapha ndle kwekubuka buhla nga nelizinga letenhla lo, luyafinyelela kutinsi ta ngalokulinganako kute lusitakale lwente kancono kuluhlobo lwemdlalo lelu wutsandzako.”Langelihle Nkosi (lone minyaka yebudzala le-16) lomntjwezi ubonge lomasi pala ngalomnikelo.
“Kuyangitfokotisa kuta kutifundvo tekuntjweza ngoba tiyangincedza ku gcina umtimba wami  usesimeni lesikahle fu tsi ngiyatsandza kudlala ngemagagasi.” Nkosi wa gcugcutela labanye laba nesifiso sekuntjweza kutsi bete babeyincenye bafundze kabanti ngekuntjweza.
Sandile Mqadi umceceshi we-Surfers Not Street Chi ldren Club, watsi lenhla ngano beyihlose kufu ndzisa bantfwana emakho no ekuntjweza njengendle la yekubasusa emgwaceni.
“Sisita bantfwana la bahlala emigwaceni nala bo lababuya kumimango lephuyile. Tinsita tetfu atikhokhelwa kantsi futsi samukela bantfu labasha labaneminyaka yebudzala lesuka kulesihlanu kuya ku lenge-23,” kwasho Mqadi.
Wangeta ngekutsi lama bhodi masipala lanikele ngawo atawusita imitamo yabo futsi bantfwana la baningi batawukhona kuba yincenye yaloluhlelo.
I-Surfers Not Street Chi ldren Club yetfula tifu ndvo tekuntjweza kusu ka ngeMsombuluko kuya  kuLesihlanu ngensimbi  ye-08h30 kanye neye13h30. Labanesifiso se kubayincenye banga bhalisa ehhovisi le-Surfers Not Street Children Club lelise-North Beach.
Masipala uphindze wani kela ngalamanye emabhodi ekuntjweza lali-10 ku-Kwa Zulu-Natal Surfing Federa tion.

title: Litiko Letemphilo eLimpopo libeka kumunyisa ezingeni lelisha lekungaze kufikwe kulo
author: Kanego Lewele na-More Matshediso
text:
Loku kubangwa kutsi  kute tindzawo letikahle eti ndzaweni letiningi bomake labanentinswane labasebe ntela kuto lapho bangakha ma lubisi noma bamunyise bantfwana babo ngesikhatsi semsebenti, kubenta balahle kelwe sifiso sekuchubeka bamunyise ngenca yekutsi bacitsa sikhatsi lesinyenti basemsebentini bantfwana bangekho nabo.
Kumtamo wetfu wekubuka na nalenseyeya, Litiko Le -temphilo laseLimpopo li sungule ligumbi lelilekuca la lekumunyisa nekukhama lubisi emahhovisini alo.
Leligumbi lekumunyisa le tfulwe nguMphatsiswatiko Dkt. Phophi Ramathuba.
Licanjwe ngeligama laMa ke Albertina Sisulu lesigu bha umkhosi weminyaka le likhulu yekutalwa kwakhe lomnyaka.
Siyatsemba kutsi leligu mbi angeke lisekele kuphe -la bomake labamunyisako, kodvwa litawugcugcutela la manye ematiko kutsi asekele bomake labamunyisako eti ndzaweni labasebentela kuto.
Tisebenti talelitiko tingavu mela bantfu labasala neba ntfwana kutsi baletse ti nswane emsebentini nge tikhatsi tekudla kute timu nyiswe. Leligumbi linga setjentiswa futsi bomake labafuna kukhama lubisi ngesikhatsi semsebenti.
Lomunye wetisebenti  talelitiko Mpho Kutumela longumake wemawele lane tinyanga leti-11, umfana nentfombatane, uyalitfokote la leligumbi.
“Leligumbi litasisebe ntela sibomake ngoba li tawuphindza lisinike litfuba lekukhama lubisi ngekukhu luleka endzaweni lelungele loko,” washo njalo.
Bomake labavakashela li tiko nganoma ngabe ngutiphi tizatfu bahamba nebantfwa na babo nabo batawuvunye lwa kusebentisa leligumbi kumunyisa bantfwana.  Umphatsiswatiko Ramathu ba watsi i-Albertina Sisulu Breastfeeding Room ngiyo yodvwa kuso sonkhe si fundza.Umphatsiswasito utsemba kutsi lomkhankhaso uta wugcugcutela kukhula neku vikela tindlela letivulekile tekumunyisa ngenhloso yekuzuza kukhula loku mcoka lokunemphilo e mntfwaneni.
“Lubisi lwelibele lunayo yonkhe imisoco ledzingwa tinswane futsi ayikho lenye indlela lelingentiwa ngayo ngaphandle kwekumunyi sa,” kwaso Umphatsiswa tiko. 

 Umphatsiswatiko Wetemphilo eLimpopo Dkt. Phophi Ramathuba bekahamba nabomake labamunyisako batotfula umkhankaso wekumunyisa.
Tinzuzo tekumunyisa
• Lubisi lwelibele lunemasotja emtimba lancedza umntfwana kulwa nemagciwane nemabhakhtheriya.
• Kumunyisa kunciphisa ematfuba ekutsi umntfwana angenwe ma-aleji.  
• Bantfwana labamunyako ngalokugcwele tonkhe tinyanga letisitfupha tekucala banematfuba lamancane ekutselelwa tifo, kugula lokumayelana nekuphefumula kanye nensheko lengapheli.

title: Tivakashi taphesheya atiwuvali umlomo ngemphatfo yeNingizimu Afrika
author: Dale Hes
text:
Kutilungiselela kwamukela letivakashi, lamacembu ange nele emaseshini ekuticecesha lamayelana netekuvakasha netekudla.
Lamacembu afundziswe emakhono lahambisana neku cala nekuchuba emabhizinisi, ngenhloso yekutsi aphume lele kwenta imali kulemboni yetekuvakasha.
Nomzamo Entile (lone minyaka yebudzala lenge-31) loyincenye yalamacembu la sitfupha ungumholi welice mbu i-Explore our Hood, la seThembalethu. Entile wacala i-Explore our Hood kute agcu gcutele umoya wekusebenti sana e-George.
“Sabona kutsi bekuneku ngavani kumimango leye hlukahlukene yase-George.
Sifuna bantfu bete emaloki shini batobona kutsi sinelisiko lesiXhosa lelinemandla leku fanele kutsi batibonele lona,” kwasho Entile. Kumalungiselelo Enyanga Yetekuvakasha, lelicembu sevele lente timbili tindlela tekuhlola kutilungiselela, lamukela emalunga emboni yetekuvakasha.
“Sikulungele kuvakashe lwa futsi siyatfokota kakhu lu kwamukela tivakashi taphesheya. Siyatsemba ku tsi loku kutawuvula ematfu ba kitsi sonkhe ekutsi sitfole sipiliyoni kulemboni yeteku vakasha, futsi kutawukho mbisa kutsi emalokishi ase Ningizimu Afrika kuni ngi langakwentela tivakashi taphesheya netalapha  ekhaya,’ kwasho Entile.
Umphatsi we-George Tou rism Joan Shaw utsi loluhle lo lutawuveta tinhlobohlobo temasiko.
“Loluhlelo lwetfu lwe-Dine with Locals lumelele lokwe hlukahlukana kwesive, le sinetinhlobohlobo temasiko langetulu kwalasihlanu le kusiXhosa, siVenda, si-Khoi, si-Cape Malay kanye nale lo lekudla kwaselwandle i-'Snoek and Patat' , kwasho Shaw.
Emva kwalemisebenti, la macembu atawuba bosoma bhizinisi labatfula tinsita ku-George Tourism, kanja lo nayo itawukhangisa futsi isebentise letinsita letetfulwa ngilamacembu.

title: Konkhe Lodzinga Ku kwati Ngekucala i-B&B
author: Dale Hes
text:
Iyini i-B&B? Ngekusho kwe-Tourism Grading Council of South Africa, ema-B&B mabhizinsi lanendzawo yekulala leneti nsita letifanako naletiniketwa emakhaya.
Likamelo ngalinye kufanele libe nendlu yekugezela, kantsi sidlo sasekuseni kufanele sibe khona kulamanani ekulala.
Kungeta kuloko, kuniketa tinsita kulelikamelo kufanele kwenteke onkhe malanga ngalesikhatsi tivakashi titahle li.
I-B&B ivumele kutsi ibe namakamelo etivakashi la matsatfu kuphela. Uma ngabe linemakelo langetulu kunalo ku, ngako-ke indzawo yakho kufanele kutsi ibitwe ngekutsi yi-Guest House.  Ngutiphi tinchubo lekufanele utilandzele kute ucale libhizinisi ye-B&B?Sinyatselo sekucala lekufanele usitsatse kutsi uye kuma sipala wendzawo uyafaka sicelo sekuniketwa imvume yekusebentisa indzawo yakho njengebhizinisi leninendzawo yekulala. Ungahle udzinge imvume kubomakhelwane wakho, bese ukhangisa tatiso kwatisa bantfu, uma ngabe bafuna kuphawula kulesicelo sakho.
Uma ngabe utfola imvume kumasipala, kungadzingeka kwekutsi uhambisane na letinye tidzingo temtsetfo.
Tintfo letibalulekiIe lekufanele utinakeIndzawo – Indzawo lapho ku tfolakala khona i-B&B yakho ibaluleke kakhulu. Uma ngabe uhlala endzaweni lengahehi tivakashi, ngako-ke kutawuba lukhuni kwenta kutsi ibhizinisi yakho iphumelele.
Timali  – Tekuvakasha tiba khona ngetikhatsi letitsite, nga ko-ke kutawudzingeka kutsi wonge kakhulu kute uchubeke usebente ngetikhatsi letingasi matasatasa ekhatsi nemnyaka.
Kuphila imphilo lensha  – Imphi lo loyiphilako itawuntjintja nga lokuphelele uma ngabe uba ngumnikati we-B&B. Kutawu -hlala kudzingeka kwekutsi uhlala uvuka ekuseni uyolala ebusuku, kantsi kutawufuna wente tingucuko ngenca yeti vakashi letitawuta ekhaya la kho. Kantsi kutawufanele ku tsi wente siciniseko sekuhlala ulungisa ugcine netivakashi takho tinelisekile ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
Kukhangisa i-B&B yakho  – Timboni tetindzawo tekulala tiyancintisana, ngako-ke kutawudzingeka kutsi  usise sikhatsi sakho nemali ekukhangiseni i-B&B. Kuta wufanele kutsi ucabange ngetindlela letikhombisa kuhlakanipha tekukhangisa ibhizinisi yakho. 

Kutfola lwati lolungetiwe shayela i-Tourism Grading Council of South Africa ku: 011 895 3000.

title: Hulumende Welekelela Emakhaya
author: Dale Hes
text:
Kugatsatselwa  intsela kuhlo se kwe lekele la emakha ya lanemholo lo mncane, bese aci tsa incenye lenkhulu  yemali lebayiholako eti ntfweni tasekhaya.
Tintfo letingatsatselwa i ntsela atifakelwa i-15% yeNtsela ntsengo (i-VAT).
Loku ku hloswe  kusi ta ba ntfu ba seNi ngizimu  Afrika  kutsi bonge i mali.
Kunetinhlo bo teku dla lokuba lulekile  leti-19 leti ngafake lwa i-VAT letifaka ekha tsi loku: u mbila, sitambu, lilayisi, sinkhwa lesimnyama, ti tselo, tibhidvo, ti nhlanti nemacandza.
Kwengeta, tintfo letifa na nedizili, phethiloli napharafini, kanye na letinye tinsita letifaka ekha tsi kucashwa kwendzawo yekuhlala, sitimela neteku tfutsa tasemgwacweni neti nsita tekufundza, nato ange ke tiyikhokhe i-VAT.
Ngenyanga yeNdlova na hulumende umemetele kwekutsi utawukhuphu la i-VAT kusukela ku14% kuya ku-15%. Hulumende ubuye wabona kwekut si emakhaya laphuyile atawucindzeteleka kakhulu ngetimali.
Kwehlisa lokwenyu ka kwemazinga ekuphi la, Ndvuna Wetimali  Nhlanhla Nene ucoke litsimba lelitawukhi pha tiphakamiso kwe kutsi ngutiphi letinye tintfo tasekhaya leti ngangetwa kuleti leti ngatsatselwa intsela.
Ngekuva kwelucwaningo lolubanti nekutsintsana ne bantfu, lelitsimba  lancoma kwekutsi letinye tintfo tifa kwe kuloluhla. Letintfo ti faka ekhatsi loku:
• Sinkhwa lesimhlophe• Fulawa lomhlophe• Fulawa wemakhekhe• Imikhicito yetishubelo • Umfaniswano wesikolo• EmanabukeniLelitsimba libuye lakhutsa ta Temafa Avelonkhe kutsi ticinisekise kwekutsi tonkhe letinzuzo letingakhokhe lwa intsela tiya kubatsengi kunekuya kubakhiciti.
Lelitsimba libuye lancoma letinye tindlela tekuchubeka kusitwe emakhaya laphuyile, ngekwenta ncono tinhlelo tahulumende letifaka ekhatsi kusekelwa ngetintfo letine msoco letidliwako, kuniketwa kwemikhicito yetishubelo kanye netibonelelo tahulumende etintfweni hulumende atawukhuphula inchitfo kuto.
Ndvuna Nene enkhulumeni yakhe yeLwabiwotimali utsite hulumende utawusebentela kucinisekisa labahlupheke kakhulu abatsintseki kakhulu ngalamazinga e-VAT.

title: Sithibe uphila imphilo yakhe lencono njengomuntfu lone-albinism
author: Galoome Shopane
text:
Uyatigcabha ngekuba  nalo mba la esikhu njeni sa khe futsi  akavume li tinkho lelo leti ngasiliciniso kutsi timtsi kamete.
“Kubalule kile kubantfu  labafana na mi kutsi  banga vumi kutsi labanye ba chaze kutsi babobani. Ti gcabhe ngekuba ne-albinism  ngoba wakheke waba mu hle,” asho alandzisa. Sithibe (loneminyaka  lenge-28) lohlala eKroonstad esifundzeni saseFreyistata, uchaza kwekutsi simo sakhe sihamba emndenini lapho khona umuntfu wakhona uba ne-melanin lenganele le menta abe mhlophe esikhu njeni sakhe, etinweleni noma emehlweni.
“Asisiwo umutsi noma bantfu labafana netilwane letingatiwa kutsi tivelaphi njengoba bantfu bacabanga.
Singebantfu njengalabanye bantfu.”Sithibe wenta tintfo  letinyenti. Ungunobuhle lobuye asebentise timphahla tekugcoka tesimanje kwatisa nekucwayisa ngebantfu la bane-albinism  kantsi ubuye amelele bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka eFreyistata.
Utsi ukhulele emndenini lonelutsandvo longazange umente ative anemehluko noma angatsandvwa kahle ngoba amhlophe esikhu njeni.
“Bengingavisisi kwekutsi kungani umbala wesikhu mba sami wehlukile kunala banye bantfu, kungani njalo uma ngiphumela ngapha ndle bantfu bangibite nge magama futsi bangibuke njengesihambi.”Lokwecwaswa lokubekwa kubantfu labane-albinism  kwenta Sithibe awubonge kakhulu umndeni wa khe, awunikete ludvumo ngalokuba ngumfati lotime le nalocinile lelekanguye namuhla.  Letinye tintfo laphumelele kuto Sithibe nalekatigcabha ngato tifaka ekhatsi kutsi aniketwe umchele wekuba ngu-Miss Free State Albi nism 2018  nekutsi akhetfwe njengalomunye walabase maphetselweni kula bayi-Face of Free State Fashi on Week 2018.
Njengoba Inyoni kuyi Nyanga Yekwatisa Nge-Albi nism, Sithibe utsi utawujabu la kubona bantfu labanyenti labane-albinism  bativeta kantsi benta tintfo letinhle kulomkhakha wabonobuhle naleminye imikhakha.

Sithibe uphila imphilo yakhe lenco no njengomuntfu lonealbinism Ngabe bantfu labanealbinism  bangatinakekela njani?• Abavikele kushiswa lilanga ngesikhatsi lilanga lishisa kakhulu (kusukela nga-9 ekuseni kuya ku-3 ntsambama).
• Yembatsa timphahla letivikelako netigcoko telilanga, emahembe lanentsambo nemikhono lemidze.
• Sebentisa kwekuvikela kushiswa lilanga njalo lokufana neSPF 30  bese uphindze uyagcobisa njalo ngemuva kwemahora lamabili uma ungaphandle elangeni.
• Vakashela dokotela wakho njalo wentele kuhlolwa sikhumba nemehlo.
• Gcoka tibuko uma uselangeni.

title: Kubhalisa Umshado Wesintfu Kuvikela Imindeni
author: Dale Hes
text:
Vuk: Iyini imishado yesi ntfu?MvN: Imishado yesintfu yenti wa ngekusebentisa emasiko nemihambo lehlonishwako kubantfu baseNingizimu Afrika.
Vuk: Nguyiphi imitsetfo leku fanele lemishado ihambisane nayo?MvN: Imishado yesi ntfu ilawulwa ngeMtsetfo Wekunakwa Kwemishado Yesintfu, 120 wanga-1998.
Letidzingo letilandzelako kufanele kufinyelelwe kuto:
■ Emacala omabili kufanele avume kutsi ayashada.
■ Labalingani bobabili ku fanele babe ngetulu kwe minyaka le-18, ngaphandle  kwekutsi labatali noma bondli ngalokusemtse tfweni baniketa imvume uma ngabe munye noma bobabili bangebantfwana.
■ Lomshado kufanele ubha liswe kuLitiko Letase -khaya kungakapheli tinyanga letintsatfu kute kuvikelwe tinshisekelo tebalingani, bantfwana nemndeni uma kwentekile kwaba nekudivosa neku fa.
 ■ Uma ngabe ubhalisa lo mshado, umlingani ku fanele aletse emakhophi amatisi wakhe nesivume lwano semalobolo (uma sikhona). Lokungenani kufanele kube nafakazi munye lovela emndenini ngamunye.
■  Indvodza lefuna kushada umshado wesintfu wesibi li nalomunye umfati ku fanele ibhalele enkhantolo ifake sicelo.
■ Bantfu labayincenye ye mshado wesilungu angeke bashade umshado wesi ntfu.
Lomtsetfo Wekunaka U mshado Wesintfu ubeka kwe kutsi bobabili laba labasha dile banemalungelo lafanako njengendvodza nemfati.Vuk:  Ngutiphi tinkinga leti ngaba khona emshadweni wesintfu?MvN: Kungabhaliswa kuba nga tinkhinga letinkhulu.
Kubhaliswa kuniketa bufa kazi bekutsi lomshado ukho na, kucinisekisa kwekutsi umshado longakabhaliswa ukhona kulukhuni. Loku ku tawuba nemtselela emandleni enkhantolo ekukhona ku vikela balingani nabadivosa, kuhlomula kulifa laloshonile kanye nemalungelo ebantfwa na nemalunga emndeni.
Lolunye ludzaba lolubalule kile emshwadweni wesintfu kwekutsi ebalingani abakuvi sisi kudivosa nekwehlukana.
Kubalulekile kuveta kwekutsi yinkhantolo lenemandla nemvume kuphela lengani keta idivosi. Labashadile labahlukana ngalokungekho emtsetfweni angeke bahlo mula kulomtsetfo lolawula kucedvwa kwemshado.

title: Emadvodza emadvo dzeni: Yiba yindvo dza, mfana wami
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Ngesikhatsi lomhlaseli wadzadzewabo labehlomile atjela Tshepo kutsi alale phasi angabukeli, usakuva nanyalo kukhala kwadzadzewabo.
Ngemuva kwalokuhlasela, lendvodza yatjela letela mani kutsi tibaleke tingabuki emuva. Ngesikhatsi babaleka kabuhlungu baya ekhaya, dzadzewabo wamtjela kutsi akatsembise kutsi ngeke atjele muntfu ngalokudlwengulwa kwakhe. Tshepo wakugcina esifubeni loko kodvwa lemfihlo yamenta wahlala njalo amunyu emoyeni.
“Ngesikhatsi ngikhula, bengimbona lomdlwenguli ahambahamba khona lapha eKatlehong kantsi loko kwange-nta ngatfukutsela kakhulu.
Angizange ngikwemukele kutsi akazange atjeziswa ngalesento sakhe.”Ngesikhatsi sekamdzala, se kalibhungu leselicinile, Tshepo akazange akhone kubamba lulaka lwakhe, bekamhlasela njalo lomuntfu lowadlwe ngula dzadzewabo nakatfuke wambona. Wantjintja ekubeni ngumntfwana lonekuthula waba ngumfanyana lohlala atfutkutsele.
Timbili tintfo letasindzisa Tshepo kulendlela yakhe yebudlova. Kwekucala, bekabu sisekile kutsi abe nababe kanye nemnakabo lomdzala labebati kutsi budlova abusilo likhambi nanome kodvwa bebangati kutsi kubangelwa yini kutsi Tshepo atiphatse ngalendlela, bakhona kumeluleka bambuyisela  endleleni lecondzile. Kwesibili kungenelela kwemaphoyisa  kajantji lelabona ngesikhatsi Tshepo ahlasela kwekugcina umdlwenguli wadzadzewabo.
Lomdlwenguli wasala aphuke umlente kodvwa ngesikhatsi Tshepo achazela emaphoyisa kajantji kutsi lomuntfu wentani yonkhe leminyaka leyandlu la, ancuma kutsi alikhulule lelibhungu ngekulecwayisa.
Lomdlwenguli wamikiswa esi bhedlela kodvwa akazange aye kuyowumangala.
Sekuvamile kuhlaselwa kwabomake, nanome kunjalo Tshepo bekakhatsatekile kakhu lu. Ngesikhatsi asasengumfu ndzi lapha e-Pretoria Technikon, wasita ekusunguleni licembu lekucaphelisa emadvodza ngendzima yawo lekumele kutsi ayidlale emmangweni kantsi nga-2004, wabhalisa licembu lemadvodza i-South African Men’s Action Group (i-SAMAG) njengenhlangano lengekho ngaphasi kwahulu mende.
